According to news on November 20, a joint document seen by Reuters showed that France, Germany, and Italy have reached an agreement on how to regulate artificial intelligence (AI), which is expected to accelerate negotiations at the European level. The three governments support "mandatory self-regulation" of basic AI models through codes of conduct, but they oppose "untested norms." So-called AI base models are designed to produce a wide range of outputs. France, Germany and Italy said in a joint document: "We jointly emphasize that the AI Act regulates AI applications rather than the technology itself. The inherent risks of AI systems lie in the application rather than the technology." Foreign media expect that Germany, France and Italy will reach an agreement This agreement will accelerate negotiations at the European level and provide a blueprint for European-level AI regulatory guidelines. (Lianhe Zaobao)Collapsed

Bloomberg reports "Altman returns to OpenAI as CEO, former U.S. Treasury Secretary Summers joins board of directors" - This reversal came under intense pressure from OpenAI's big investors - employees threatened to resign if Altman's position was not reinstated. Welcoming Sam Altman back and conducting a major reorganization of the board of directors, introducing new directors including Larry Summers, this change has attracted great attention in Silicon Valley and the global AI circle. Altman will return as CEO, and the new board of directors will be chaired by Bret Taylor, the former co-CEO of Salesforce.com Inc. and a director of Twitter before being acquired by Elon Musk. Other directors include Summers, who served as U.S. Treasury Secretary under President Bill Clinton, and current member Adam D'Angelo, co-founder and CEO of Quora Inc. OpenAI released a statement on X (formerly Twitter), saying the company is "discussing specific details." After Altman was unexpectedly removed, almost all OpenAI employees threatened to resign, and the company decided to reappoint its co-founder. The decision quickly prompted congratulations from key figures at X, including former president Greg Brockman, who said he would also be returning, as did chief technology officer Mira Murati. Altman was fired on Friday over disagreements with the board over the rapid development and commercialization of artificial intelligence. He has been negotiating with the company for reinstatement. Those talks stalled on Sunday as Altman and others pressured existing board members to resign, according to people familiar with the matter. Ultimately, the board appointed a new leader—former Twitch CEO Emmett Shear—and Microsoft Corp., OpenAI’s biggest backer, said it would hire Altman to lead a new internal AI team. In just a few hours, the majority of OpenAI's 770 employees signed a letter to the board of directors saying they might leave to join Microsoft if they didn't all resign and reinstate Altman. Signatories to the letter include Murati, who was named interim CEO, and OpenAI co-founder and board member Ilya Sutskever, who has differences with Altman over the company's direction. Sutskever posted on X (formerly Twitter) on Monday: "I deeply regret participating in the board's decision. I never meant to harm OpenAI. I love everything we have created together and will do my best to restore unity to the company." Altman The return caps a tumultuous past few days that have plunged the world's best-known AI startup into chaos. Summers is a Harvard professor and a staff writer for Bloomberg Television who also serves on the boards of Jack Dorsey's Block Inc. and Skillsoft Corp. This swift policy reversal may appease investors and reduce the risk of employee exodus en masse. However, it also raises questions about the future path for ChatGPT’s makers and other AI startups. These companies have struggled to find a balance between developing artificial intelligence responsibly while raising huge sums of money from investors to support the expensive computing infrastructure required to build these tools. OpenAI was founded in 2015 as a non-profit organization whose purpose is to promote the development of artificial intelligence (AI) and aim to benefit mankind rather than pursue financial gain. The organization later transformed into a profit-cap company and raised billions of dollars from Microsoft and other investors. Although Altman played a major role in these transactions, OpenAI is still governed by a nonprofit board of directors. In recent days, this internal tension has intensified and become the focus of public attention. News of Altman's removal caught the startup's investors off guard. Microsoft, one of the major backers that invested more than $10 billion in the startup, was notified only minutes before Altman was fired. The software giant then began working with investors including Thrive Capital and Tiger Global Management to try to bring Altman back. People familiar with the matter said they wished to discuss the private information anonymously. But when that effort failed, Microsoft decided to hire Altman and others from OpenAI. Meanwhile, OpenAI faces a new uncertainty: whether to let employees sell their shares at a valuation of $86 billion. Thrive, which is expected to lead the employee stock tender offer, had not paid as of Saturday and told OpenAI that Altman's departure would affect its decision-making, people familiar with the matter said. Among all the figures, the 38-year-old Altman has become the spokesperson of artificial intelligence technology in the new era with the success and popularity of ChatGPT. This year, Altman has not only been actively working with regulators within the industry, but has also met regularly with world leaders, including U.S. President Joe Biden and British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak. On Thursday, he also participated in an Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation panel discussion with other executives and world leaders to discuss the future of AI and its risks. But behind the scenes, conflicts between Altman and board members escalated, particularly with Sutskever. They disagree on how to quickly develop generative AI, how to commercialize the product, and what measures to take to mitigate its potential harm to the public, according to people familiar with the matter. Other board members at the time included D'Angelo, Tasha McCauley, CEO of GeoSimSystems, and Helen Toner, director of strategic and basic research grant programs at Georgetown University's Center for Security and Emerging Technologies. Beyond strategic differences, board members also had to contend with Altman's entrepreneurial ambitions. Altman has been trying to raise billions of dollars from sovereign wealth funds in the Middle East to start an AI chip company that would compete with Nvidia Corp., according to people familiar with the matter. In addition, Altman is also negotiating with SoftBank Group Corp. Chairman Masayoshi Son, hoping to obtain billions of dollars in investment to collaborate with former Apple designer Jony Ive to develop AI-oriented hardware. Altman's side hustles add complexity to his relationship with the board. OpenAI said in a statement on Friday that the board's internal review found that Altman was not always candid in his communications with the board, which hindered the board from fulfilling its responsibilities. As a result, the board no longer has confidence in his ability to continue leading OpenAI. The boardroom shakeup is reminiscent of other major events in Silicon Valley history. For example, Apple co-founder Steve Jobs was fired in 1985 and returned more than a decade later; Twitter co-founder Dorsey left in 2008 and returned as CEO seven years later. Hide d

[CMA CGM invests in artificial intelligence] CMA CGM (CMACGM), together with French telecom operator iliad Group and Schmidt Ventures, the venture capital arm of Google founder Eric Schmidt, each invested 100 million euros to jointly establish Europe's first open research experiment dedicated to artificial intelligence (AI) Room--Kyutai. It is now seeking to attract other private investors to come on board to provide long-term funding for the work. O CMA CGM invests in artificial intelligence | Shipping industry

Working together to promote global development □Our reporter Tang Li From November 18th to 19th, the first "Tongzhou·Global Development Forum" was held at the Beijing International Wealth Center. This forum was hosted by Renmin University of China and co-organized by Renmin University of China and the Tongzhou District People's Government. More than 400 guests from more than 30 countries and regions around the world exchanged ideas in depth around the theme of "jointly promoting global development and building a common future". Let’s jointly plan a new blueprint for development and write a new picture of cooperation. Development is the eternal theme of human society. At present, major changes unseen in a century are accelerating, and the world is once again standing at the crossroads of history. To solve the problems of the century and the times, we need to continue to build global development consensus, inspire global development confidence, gather global development forces, and work together. Create development results. Entering the new era, China has adhered to the priority of development, made every effort to promote global development cooperation, deeply participated in global development governance, and made remarkable achievements. Former Montenegrin President Filip Vujanovic said that the implementation of the “One Belt, One Road” initiative has enhanced the connectivity of the co-building countries in the fields of economy, culture, education and other fields, promoted people-to-people connectivity, and promoted win-win cooperation. Adrian Nastase, former Prime Minister of Romania, pointed out that China has always insisted on seeking common ground while reserving differences in global development concepts, rules, and standards. It strives to promote North-South cooperation, is committed to answering common questions, and provides action plans for the common development of all parties. Former British Business Secretary Vince Cable believes that as the "three major global initiatives" continue to be implemented and continue to promote the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind, China has the opportunity and ability to engage in dialogue and cooperation with other countries to jointly address climate change, Global challenges such as human health and uneven economic development between the North and the South should be actively played in adhering to multilateralism, strengthening mutual learning among civilizations, and promoting changes in the global governance system. Luo Zhaohui, Director of the China International Development Cooperation Agency, said that currently, around global development, the game between great powers is intensifying, North-South cooperation is slowing down, and the development gap is widening. We should strengthen the leading role of the United Nations, promote deepening cooperation among countries, and promote the common development of the "Global South" Demonstrate greater responsibility and greater achievements in coordinating security and development, unite and work together, and make new contributions to the implementation of the "three major global initiatives" and the "Belt and Road" initiative, continue to promote global common development, and realize the vision of world modernization . Various problems and challenges existing in today's world need to be solved by relying on development, changes in development models and further development. The theme report released by the forum, "Development as the Solution and Globalization as the Development Platform," proposed that the development path leading to 2050 should adhere to development priority, adhere to the people-centered approach, adhere to fairness, universal benefit, inclusiveness, and adhere to innovation Driven by adhering to the harmonious coexistence of man and nature, and adhering to action orientation. China and the world's intellectual community are jointly faced with the important task of creating and developing new, more sound and effective development theories. They should focus on development and make development the central issue of knowledge production; use Chinese-style modernization as an example to build practical and effective development theories. Theory; transcend national and national standards and build a theory of global common development. Zhang Donggang, Secretary of the Party Committee of Renmin University of China, announced seven action initiatives proposed by the "Tongzhou Global Development Forum" mechanism at the meeting. First, focus on expanding global development cooperation, adhering to the principle of openness, building a global academic cooperation network, building a high-end strategic dialogue and cooperation platform, and promoting the construction of a new era that takes development as the solution, the world as the development platform, and peace and development as the goals. pattern. The second is to work together to promote global development as a priority, unite the global intellectual community, create more public intellectual products and smart products that promote the progress of human civilization, produce more new knowledge achievements that serve economic and scientific and technological progress, and help achieve a people-centered and universal benefit. A healthy new development that is inclusive, innovation-driven, and harmonious between man and nature. The third is to focus on solving global security problems, promote knowledge innovation, theoretical innovation, and method innovation, actively respond to global issues such as network security, biosecurity, data security, and artificial intelligence security, and prevent and resolve security risks. The fourth is to focus on optimizing global security governance, actively participate in research on major global issues, practice and promote the common values of all mankind, and promote global governance in a more fair and reasonable direction. The fifth is to work together to enhance exchanges among global civilizations, strengthen international academic exchanges and cooperation, and promote mutual learning and exchange among different civilizations in the world. Sixth, we must work together to promote the progress of global civilization, promote the creative transformation and innovative development of excellent traditional cultures of various countries, and jointly promote new progress in the development of human civilization. Seventh, establish a permanent mechanism for the forum to promote the implementation of relevant action initiatives. Hide d

[Artificial Intelligence Safety: The story behind the shock to OpenAI’s management? 】The development of artificial intelligence has brought great convenience and well-being to mankind, but it has also brought some risks and challenges, such as data privacy, algorithm bias, human-machine conflict, super intelligence, etc. How to ensure the safety of artificial intelligence is an urgent problem that needs to be solved. Recently, OpenAI, a leading company in the field of artificial intelligence, experienced a management shock that shocked the technology industry. OpenAI's board of directors announced on Friday that CEO Sam Altman was fired and left the board because he was "not candid" in his communications with the board, which affected the board's ability to perform its duties. Altman's firing sent shockwaves through the tech world, sparking various rumors on social media about the reasons behind Altman's departure, which have not yet been confirmed. A key factor in Altman's firing was reportedly the tension between him and the OpenAI board of directors, with Altman favoring a more aggressive push for AI development and the board wanting to move more cautiously. Members of OpenAI's board of directors have different concepts and views on the safety of artificial intelligence, which may be the root cause of the management shock. Altman and Brockman believe that the development of artificial intelligence should be more open and rapid to benefit more people, but also to prevent other organizations from gaining the advantages of artificial intelligence. They advocate more investment in commercializing and scaling AI, as well as more collaboration with other companies and institutions. They also support increased development and use of ChatGPT. Other members of the board of directors, Sutskever and Toner, believe that the development of artificial intelligence should be more cautious and responsible to avoid possible harm and unpredictable consequences. They advocate paying more attention to the safety and ethics of artificial intelligence, as well as more communication and coordination with governments and society, such as the United Nations, the European Union, the U.S. Congress, etc. They also oppose excessive reliance and use of ChatGPT, an artificial intelligence tool that may have powerful influence and potential risks. It may be used to create false and misleading information, such as fake news, rumors, slander, etc. The conflict between these two concepts caused a huge shock to OpenAI's management and also reflected a common problem in the field of artificial intelligence: how to balance the development and safety of artificial intelligence. There is no easy answer to this question, and it requires joint efforts and collaboration from all parties to ensure that artificial intelligence can bring more benefits to mankind rather than harm. Artificial intelligence close d

[] After a period of negotiations, late at night on November 21, local time, the artificial intelligence development organization OpenAI announced that it had reached an agreement in principle, and founder Sam Altman returned to the company as CEO, "and formed a company led by Bret Taylor ( Chairman), Larry Summers, and Adam D'Angelo. We are working together to figure out the details. Thank you very much for your patience on this." Just over 4 days have passed since the OpenAI board announced the removal of Altman, and this " The drama "Palace Fight" has experienced reversals again and again, and the process is ups and downs and exciting. OpenAI high-level shock event timeline (San Francisco local time) Main figures: OpenAI co-founder and former CEO Sam Altman OpenAI co-founder and former president Greg Brockman OpenAI co-founder , Chief Scientist Ilya Sutskever OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella OpenAI Interim CEO Emmett · Emmett Shear Sutskvi notified Altman of a meeting on November 16. Altman attended the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation CEO Summit event in California and discussed art and artists at an event in Oakland. future. According to Brockman's post on X, formerly known as Twitter, Sutskwe texted Altman that night to ask about arranging a conference call at noon the next day. Brockman said Mulati learned that night that Altman would be fired. At noon on November 17, when Altman was publicly announced to be fired, Altman was in Las Vegas to attend the weekend's biggest party, the Formula One race. After clicking on the Google Meet link in the hotel room, Suzkowe said that he Will be fired, news will be announced soon. No explanation was given. Brockman said that shortly after noon on the 17th, he received a text message from Sutskwei requesting a call. After receiving the GoogleMeet link four minutes later, Brockman was informed that he would be removed as chairman of the board "but will remain critical to the company and will retain his position as president" and that Altman had been fired. At about the same time, OpenAI published an article on its blog announcing executive changes - Altman was publicly announced as being fired for "consistently being uncandid in his communications with the board of directors and hindering the board of directors from fulfilling its responsibilities." ability". Mulati was appointed interim CEO. OpenAI held a general meeting that afternoon, at which Sutskwe defended the board's decision to oust Altman. He dismissed suggestions that ousting Ultraman amounted to a "hostile takeover" and claimed it was necessary to protect OpenAI's mission of "making artificial intelligence benefit humanity." After the meeting, the executive team reconvened in the conference room. An executive told Sutskvi that the lack of detail in the termination announcement was unacceptable and asked other board members to participate in a video call to explain, according to people familiar with the matter. During the call, the executive team pressed the board for about 40 minutes to provide specific examples of Altman's "dishonor," which the board refused to do, citing legal reasons. Some executives said they received inquiries from regulators and law enforcement agencies such as the U.S. Attorney's Office in Manhattan about Altman's "dishonesty." The board agreed to discuss the matter with its attorneys. They came back hours later but still wouldn't provide specifics. They say Ultraman is not honest and often does whatever he wants. The board said Altman was too well-versed for the board to give specific examples, according to people familiar with the executive. Executives requested written examples of board allegations. Microsoft issued a statement Microsoft's Nadella, a major OpenAI investor and partner, issued a statement: "As you will see this week at Microsoft Ignite conference, we will continue to innovate rapidly for this era of AI. We are working across the entire technology stack More than 100 announcements have been made in , including AI systems, models and tools in Azure (Microsoft cloud) and Copilot. Most importantly, we are committed to providing our customers with all of this while building the future. We have signed a contract with OpenAI The long-term agreement provides full access to everything we need to deliver on our innovation agenda and exciting product roadmap, and will continue to be committed to our partnerships, including Mira and the team. Together, we will continue to bring this The value of this technology brings to the whole world." Altman called Nadella and expressed his hope to continue studying this technology. They devised various ways to undo the day's events, but also began working on a backup plan for Altman to have a group of his top researchers create a new division within the tech giant, according to people familiar with the matter. Brockman Resigns After reading the latest news, Brockman announced his resignation from OpenAI. After he sent a memo internally, he also published the text simultaneously on X. Altman told friends he was considering starting a new company with Brockman and poaching dozens of OpenAI employees. Senior OpenAI researcher resigns Following Brockman, three senior OpenAI researchers resigned, including research director Jakub Pachocki and the Get Ready team, which prepares to deal with the "catastrophic risks" of artificial intelligence. ) head Aleksander Madry. On November 18th, Ultraman was at home. Ultraman flew back to San Francisco immediately after being fired. His home became a war room filled with OpenAI employees, including then-interim CEO Murati and other members of the executive team, plotting his return to the company. Management and board of directors continue to negotiate OpenAI's internal memo comes to light, saying Altman was fired not because of "malfeasance or anything related to our financial, business, security or security/privacy practices," but because "Sam "There was a breakdown in communication between Altman and the board of directors." In the memo, OpenAI COO Brad Lightcap said yesterday's announcement "came as a surprise to (the management team)" and that management "had multiple conversations with the board to try to better understand them." the reasons and processes behind decisions”. According to the memo, as of the morning of the 18th, discussions were still ongoing. OpenAI's financing at risk OpenAI's plan to sell employee shares, which would value the startup at about $86 billion, could be in jeopardy. Three sources at the company revealed that OpenAI no longer expects the deal, led by Thrive Capital, to happen or, if it does, the deal's valuation will be reduced due to recent developments. Ultraman Pitches New Business Ultraman pitches to investors that he plans to launch a new venture (perhaps an artificial intelligence chip startup), and Brockman is expected to join. Most importantly, we are committed to providing our customers with all of this while building the future. We have signed a contract with OpenAI The long-term agreement provides full access to everything we need to deliver on our innovation agenda and exciting product roadmap, and will continue to be committed to our partnerships, including Mira and the team. Together, we will continue to bring this The value of this technology brings to the whole world." Altman called Nadella and expressed his hope to continue studying this technology. They devised various ways to undo the day's events, but also began working on a backup plan for Altman to have a group of his top researchers create a new unit within the tech giant, according to people familiar with the matter. Microsoft said that OpenAI "must change", and CEO Nadella's attitude was "at this point, I think it is very, very clear that some things must change around governance." The Information said that after the OpenAI board initially announced that Altman was ousted, other people were contacted to take over as OpenAI's CEO: - Nat Friedman (Nat Friedman), the former CEO of GitHub, engaged in venture capital after leaving GitHub, and invested in many Artificial Intelligence Company. -Alex Wang, co-founder and CEO of ScaleAI. ScaleAI is the largest data annotation startup in Silicon Valley and one of OpenAI's data annotation suppliers. -Dario Amodei, co-founder and CEO of Anthropic. He previously worked at OpenAI and founded Anthropic after leaving in 2020. Anthropic is considered OpenAI’s biggest competitor. During this period, the OpenAI board of directors also discussed the merger of OpenAI and Anthropic with Amoudi. Finally, Twitch co-founder Emmett Shear accepted the offer and became OpenAI’s interim CEO. -Amazon invested $4 billion in Anthropic. Google invested an additional $2 billion in October. -Amazon acquired Twitch for $970 million in 2014. At a time of civil unrest at OpenAI, its customers are also looking for alternatives. According to reports, more than 100 OpenAI customers have contacted Anthropic, Google, Microsoft and other companies to inquire about business migration. They are worried that OpenAI's continued turmoil will affect the company's business operations. AWS and Anthropic temporarily formed a team to connect with OpenAI customers. More companies hope to recruit OpenAI talents. During the internal fighting at OpenAI, business leaders from Google DeepMind, Nvidia, artificial intelligence startup Cohere, Microsoft, and Salesforce issued recruitment announcements for OpenAI. Parkinson's disease is a chronic neurological disease first described by British physician James Parkinson in 1817. It usually develops in age 50 and later, and its incidence increases with age. The cause of Parkinson's disease is not fully understood, but may be related to factors such as environment, genetics and aging of the nervous system. The main symptoms of Parkinson's disease include resting tremor, bradykinesia, muscle stiffness, and postural balance disorders. Parkinson's disease affects patients' health in many ways. First of all, from a psychological perspective, patients with Parkinson's disease often suffer from depression, anxiety and other psychological problems. This is mainly due to the physiological impact of the disease itself and the psychological pressure on patients when facing the disease. Secondly, in terms of movement, Parkinson's disease can cause muscle stiffness and bradykinesia, which in turn affects the patient's walking, coordination and balance abilities. In addition, sensory aspects can also be affected. For example, some people with Parkinson's disease may experience symptoms such as loss of smell and reduced pain perception. In terms of diet, patients with Parkinson's disease may have problems such as difficulty swallowing and oral muscle incoordination, which may lead to difficulty eating and choking. Finally, Parkinson's disease can also affect a patient's sleep. Many patients will suffer from insomnia, night awakenings and other problems, which will undoubtedly greatly reduce their quality of life. In addition, with the development of artificial intelligence and machine learning technology, we may also see the emergence of more intelligent medical devices and treatments, which will bring more treatment options and hope to patients with Parkinson's disease. Traditional Chinese medicine and Western medicine have their own advantages and disadvantages in the treatment of Parkinson's disease. The advantages of traditional Chinese medicine in treating Parkinson's disease include small side effects, good overall regulatory effect, and the ability to improve patients' clinical symptoms and quality of life. The advantage of Western medicine in treating Parkinson's disease is that it has a rapid onset of action and obvious effects, but it has large side effects and high risks of surgical treatment. ParkinsonDr. Wang ShilongTraditional Chinese MedicineCollapse d

Autonomy levels of artificial intelligence as divided by Deepmind: - Autonomy level 0: no artificial intelligence, humans do everything - Example systems: analog methods (e.g., sketching with a pencil), non-artificial intelligence digital workflow (e.g., in a text editor input, draw with a drawing program) - Unlocked AI level: No AI - Introduced example risk: N/A (status quo risk) - Autonomy level 1: AI as tool, humans have full control over tasks and use AI to automate trivial tasks Tasks - Example system: Information search with the help of a search engine, Revising writing with the help of a grammar checker, Reading signs with the help of a machine translation application - Unlocked AI levels: Possible: Emerging Narrow AI, Possible: Competent Narrow AI - Example risks introduced : Skill loss (e.g., over-reliance), disrupting established industries - Autonomy Level 2: AI as advisor, AI assumes an important role, but only when called upon by humans - Example system: relies on language models to aggregate a set of documents, with the help of code Generative models accelerate computer programming, consuming most entertainment content through sophisticated recommendation systems - Unlocked AI levels: Possible: Competent Narrow AI, Possible: Expert Narrow AI, Emerging AI - Example risks introduced: Overtrust, radicalization , Targeted manipulation - Autonomy level 3: AI as a partner, humans and AI cooperate equally; interactive coordination of goals and tasks - Example system: Become a chess player through interaction and analysis training with chess AI, through interaction with AI Generated personalities for social interaction for entertainment - Unlocked AI levels: Possible: Emerging AI, Possible: Expert Narrow AI, Competent AI - Example Risks Introduced: Anthropomorphism (e.g., parasitic social relationships), Rapid Social Change - Autonomy Level 4: AI acts as expert, AI drives interactions; humans provide guidance and feedback or perform subtasks - Example system: Using AI systems to advance scientific discoveries (e.g., protein folding) - Unlocked AI levels: Possible: Artist Narrow Artificial Intelligence, Possible: Expert AI - Example Risks Introduced: Societal Scale Boredom, Mass Workforce Loss, Decline in Human Excellence - Autonomy Level 5: AI as Agent, Fully Autonomous AI - Example Systems: Autonomy AI Powered Personal Assistant (not yet unlocked) - Unlocked AI Levels: Possible: Artist AI, Artificial Superintelligence - Example Risks Introduced: Dislocation, Concentration of Power Collapsed

By observing the trend in the morning, I personally feel that there are the following characteristics. When it comes to operating the market outlook, everyone should give up their illusions. Whether you are rubbing oil on the soles of your feet or doing guerrilla operations, you must always be prepared. First, let me briefly talk about the trend in the morning so that everyone can have an objective understanding of the current A-share market trend. First, the market is still following the same old routine, with several scripts repeated over and over again. Every morning, the good news is that the FBM A50 futures index will quickly rise and then open. Then it will either rush higher and then go lower, or it will open lower and go lower. Today is the latter. One or two large-capitalization heavyweight stocks should be left in the market to protect the market, so as not to cause the market to fall too much. Banks and oil are the ones that shine today. Their gains are not big, but their symbolic significance is great. Second, main funds continue to have a large net outflow. This morning, the net outflow of main funds in the market was 8.7 billion yuan, and the Shenzhen market reached an astonishing 20.2 billion yuan. The two cities totaled 30.9 billion yuan, almost catching up with yesterday's full-day level of 35.7 billion yuan. There was no sector with a net inflow of more than 300 million yuan throughout the morning. Diet pills, traditional Chinese medicine, community group buying, etc. had a net inflow of more than 250 million yuan. Huawei Concept had a significant net outflow of 8.2 billion yuan, and new energy vehicles had a net outflow of 7.8 billion yuan. The net outflows of artificial intelligence, domestic chips, etc. all exceeded 5.5 billion yuan. As far as the main positions are concerned, there was a large net outflow of 8.44 billion yuan from institutions and 4 billion yuan from funds today, which shows that these two main institutions are selling. Judging from the capital situation of New Lithium Scenery, it is also the target of major fund selling today. Lithium batteries alone were sold for 4.7 billion yuan. Third, the current trading volume situation of the market is relatively complicated. In the short term, it is now a trend of heavy volume and stagflation. This reminds me of March 2021, when the market was also in a stagflation of heavy volume. The volume at that time was even greater than it is now. But it won’t rise. Why won’t it rise? Because domestic funds banded together to pursue the new lithium glory held by foreign investors, the results were very disappointing. From a recent perspective, the trading volume of 1.066 billion yuan on November 6 is the ceiling for this month. Since then, the market has not exceeded this level on a single trading day, but the market has hit 3,080 points twice, including hitting a new high of 3,089 points yesterday. , the volume energy is 990 billion yuan. Compared with the volume energy on November 6, this trend is shrinking to a new high, a trend of divergence between volume and price, and a pump-and-dump. Many people don’t understand what pump-and-dump is. , I am not talking nonsense, it is based on trading volume and the law of volume and price. Fourth, the Beijing Stock Exchange has risen sharply, rising by 3.55% again this morning. I would like to ask: Does it have anything to do with most retail investors? This can only show that short-term funds no longer play on the main board, but go elsewhere. This also provides a signal to our retail investors: most of the main players have successfully absconded and left the main board to retail investors. Aren’t many people looking forward to a big bull market? ? Then just wait, there will definitely be one, I don’t know when it will come. In short, the market is currently in a high-volume and shipping trend. Some people always ask me, is 3,000 points still a high level? I don't want to answer such a question. Second, no matter what the trend is in the afternoon, everyone must remain highly vigilant, wait patiently for the market adjustment to be completed, and do not act rashly. For the short-term hot spots that appear every day, such as the recent short drama concept, most retail investors did not participate in the early stage, and did not even know that such a concept existed. Now that the speculation is high, people all over the world are saying how good it is, just to let retail investors take over. Just like the weight-loss drugs in the early stage, and going forward like artificial intelligence, the Star Flash concept and other trends, there is a price but no market. The main force will fight against it by itself, waiting for the majority of retail investors to take a look. Regarding the trends of these sectors, retail investors who do not have short-term skills should not participate rashly and be aware of the risks. The adjustment of the market is currently underway, so don’t just rush in and wait for the rise to make big money after listening to some encouraging words. A-shares never believe in tears! You must wait for the short-term adjustment of the A-share market to be completed before making plans, selecting targets, finding low points, making a little profit and running, taking a shot and changing places. This is the best operation method under the current market situation. Don't have any illusions. I have already talked a lot about the trend of the market in the afternoon in yesterday's article, so I won't go into details today. If you are interested, you can read "A shares: Active correction, preparing for a big rise?" Analysis of market trends tomorrow (November 22). Hide d

Integrated development: Loan assistance companies move towards the road of bank agents, and the secrets of building a systematic customer acquisition system are revealed! With the rapid development of financial technology, loan assistance companies are actively integrating development and moving towards becoming bank agents. In this evolutionary process, building a systematic customer acquisition system has become the key to the success of loan assistance companies. This article will reveal in depth the secrets of the integrated development of loan assistance companies, and explore how to build a systematic customer acquisition system and achieve more comprehensive market expansion. 1. Optimization of digital loan process To help loan companies move towards becoming bank agents, they first need to digitally optimize the loan process. Through systematic means, loan assistance companies can improve the efficiency of loan application, approval, and disbursement, and provide customers with faster and more convenient loan services, thereby enhancing their attractiveness. 2. Accurate customer acquisition driven by big data analysis The core of systematic customer acquisition is driven by big data analysis. By deeply mining big data, loan assistance companies can more accurately understand the needs, behaviors and borrowing preferences of target customers. Accurate data analysis will provide strong support for the company to formulate more targeted customer acquisition strategies and improve market competitiveness. 3. Use social media to build brand image. In the process of integrated development, loan assistance companies need to make good use of social media and build brand image through systematic means. By posting valuable content and active interactions on social media platforms, companies can increase brand exposure and strengthen connections with potential customers, thereby achieving broader brand recognition. 4. Establish an intelligent risk management system Systematic customer acquisition is not only about attracting customers, but also requires the establishment of an intelligent risk management system. By integrating advanced technologies, such as big data analytics and artificial intelligence, loan facilitation companies are able to more accurately assess borrowers’ credit risks, reduce the company’s risk levels, and increase customer trust. 5. Cooperate with banks to develop more channels. As a bank agent, close cooperation with banks is a key part of integrated development. Through systematic means, loan assistance companies can better integrate bank channel resources, open up more potential customer channels, and achieve a comprehensive improvement of the customer acquisition system. 6. Customized services improve customer satisfaction. One of the goals of building a systematic customer acquisition system is to improve customer satisfaction. By systematically analyzing customer needs, loan assistance companies can launch customized services that are closer to customer expectations. This will win the trust of customers for the company, create a word-of-mouth effect, and further promote the development of the customer acquisition system. The integrated development of loan assistance companies and the road to becoming bank agents, building a systematic customer acquisition system is the key to success. Through systematic means such as digital loan processes, big data analysis, social media brand image building, intelligent risk management systems, cooperation with banks, and customized services, loan assistance companies can comprehensively improve customer acquisition effects and achieve a wider range of Market penetration and integration into the new era of financial technology. SaaS systems lead the trend in the loan assistance industry. How can loan assistance companies use them skillfully to achieve sustainable profits? With the rapid development of technology, SaaS system, as an important technical tool in the loan assistance industry, is leading the development direction of the industry. In this digital era, how loan assistance companies skillfully use SaaS systems to achieve sustainable profitability has become the focus of the industry. This article will provide an in-depth analysis of the leading role of SaaS systems in the loan assistance industry and how loan assistance companies can skillfully use this system to achieve sustainable profits. 1. The leading role of SaaS system. As a cloud service model, SaaS system provides highly customizable and flexible solutions for loan assistance companies. Its leading role is mainly reflected in digital transformation, process optimization, data intelligence and other aspects. With the help of SaaS systems, loan assistance companies can manage loan processes more efficiently, improve operational efficiency, reduce costs, and create a solid foundation for sustainable profitability. 2. Improve the level of risk management. The SaaS system improves the level of risk management by integrating advanced technologies such as big data and artificial intelligence. The system can more accurately assess the borrower's credit risk and reduce the non-performing loan rate, thus improving the profitability of the loan. By skillfully using the risk management tools of the SaaS system, loan assistance companies can more reliably guarantee loan recovery and achieve steady profits. 3. The data-driven personalized service SaaS system provides loan assistance companies with powerful data analysis tools, and loan assistance companies can have a deeper understanding of customer needs. Through in-depth analysis of data, companies can launch personalized products and services that are more in line with customer needs, improve customer satisfaction, cultivate customer loyalty, and lay the foundation for long-term profitability. 4. Flexible response to market changes The flexibility of the SaaS system allows loan assistance companies to respond to market changes more quickly. In the financial industry, the market environment may change at any time. By cleverly using the flexibility of SaaS systems, loan assistance companies can quickly adjust loan products and optimize service processes to better adapt to market demand, maintain competitiveness, and achieve sustainable profitability. 5. Reduce operating costs and improve efficiency. The application of SaaS systems has brought about a reduction in operating costs. Due to the automation and integration of the system, companies can focus more on core business, reduce labor costs, and improve operational efficiency. This cost-effectiveness directly provides enterprises with more profit space and achieves a sustainable profit model. Under the guidance of SaaS systems, loan assistance companies are ushering in a new stage of development in the digital era. By skillfully using this system, the company can not only improve operational efficiency and improve risk management, but also maintain agility and innovation in market competition, thereby achieving sustainable profitability and moving towards a brighter future. [ICBC’s anti-fraud smart move, real-time docking of bank police data] On November 20, the reporter learned from ICBC Liaoyang Branch that since the data platform real-time docking project has been running for a month, it has successfully used the latest technology to realize data integration with the Anti-Fraud Center of the Municipal Public Security Bureau. Real-time transmission, banks and police work together to build an anti-fraud security wall. Against the background of high incidence of telecom network fraud, ICBC Liaoyang Branch has given full play to its technological advantages, used the latest technology to invest big data and artificial intelligence in the anti-fraud campaign, and used digital technology to focus on building an "anti-fraud weapon" data platform real-time docking project. This project leverages informatization and technological means through the platform to achieve real-time connection between the bank data platform and the public security organs, helping the public security organs to carry out accurate early warning of various types of fraud information in Liaoyang City, maximizing blocking and reducing the number of people being deceived at the source. risk. The real-time docking project of the data platform has the characteristics of precision, accuracy and quality, and can quickly provide bank data support for the public security organs to handle telecom fraud cases. Next, ICBC Liaoyang Branch will continue to work closely with relevant departments to build a "golden bell" for national fraud prevention through source control and comprehensive management, eradicate the soil of crime from the root, be a pioneer in finance for the people, and contribute to building a better society. Liaoyang will make greater contributions to the high level of safety and rule of law in Liaoyang. (Reporter Xiao Nan) Hide d

[Huatai Securities: The domestic computing power gap may widen in the future. It is recommended to pay attention to the industrial chain related to computing power leasing] Securities Times e company news, Huatai Securities research report believes that computing power, as the underlying infrastructure of the AI industry, plays an important role in the development of the industry. Bottom role. The domestic computing power gap may widen in the future. The problem of computing power should be solved from different perspectives. In the short and medium term, computing power leasing is expected to alleviate the shortage of computing power in a more cost-effective way by efficiently utilizing existing resources; but in the long term, localization of computing power is inevitable The direction of development requires continuous iterative upgrades from dimensions such as GPU performance, networking capabilities, and software ecology to accelerate catch-up. ********Comment dividing line****** Short-term solution: Computing power leasing Huatai Securities believes that computing power leasing can effectively solve the problem of computing power shortage in the short term. In this way, by leasing existing computing resources, these resources can be used more effectively, thereby reducing the demand for new resources and alleviating the current contradiction between supply and demand. In addition, the cost of obtaining computing power through leasing will be lower than purchasing it. Chinese online#Collapsed

Lecture review | From the past to the future - Digital humanities research in the context of artificial intelligence. On the afternoon of November 18, the "Art Lecture Hall" of Tianjin Art Museum invited an associate professor of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, a project of the National Art Fund, and the Humanities and Social Sciences Youth Fund of the Ministry of Education. The person in charge, Mr. Jiang Ni, gave everyone a public lecture on “Taking Ancient Times to the Future—Digital Humanities Research in the Context of Artificial Intelligence”. Teacher Jiang first mentioned that each stage of the art industry does not exist in isolation. It is caused by the collision between artistic trends, artistic languages and various media. The rapid development of artificial intelligence has enabled science and technology to bring more media choices to art, forming a new art form. At the same time, technological intelligence enables installation art to incorporate diversified artistic languages and conceptual expressions, ultimately forming an art form that conforms to the development laws and cognitive habits of the times. However, artificial intelligence has both pros and cons. While enjoying the convenience, you must also be aware of the risks. Later, taking the Dunhuang exhibition as an example, Teacher Jiang used AI reconstruction and digital twin technology to dismantle cultural heritage, analyze the wisdom of ancient craftsmen from a contemporary perspective, and try high-precision Dunhuang art, the most influential art carrier in the ancient and modern world. reduction. Reproduce grottoes, Buddha statues, and murals in the virtual world, recreating the magnificent scene of the Tang Dynasty in the interplay of light and shadow. At the same time, Teacher Jiang introduced another aspect of the use of artificial intelligence to the audience - the restoration and protection of cultural relics. That is, the use of digital scanning technology can accurately observe the changes in cultural relics in the cave, record and analyze the data at any time, and carry out timely restoration. In this lecture, Teacher Jiang also mentioned the concept of "Metaverse" many times. She advocated looking at the empowerment of the "Metaverse" from an artistic perspective, assisting creation through emerging technologies, and using the stone of science to broaden the scope of art. road. At the end of the lecture, Teacher Jiang played a documentary for the audience, allowing the audience to have a deeper understanding and feel of the concept and significance of technological aesthetics in assisting the dissemination of intangible cultural heritage. Some institutions predict that the global economy will continue to decline in 2024 and may encounter challenges far greater than this year. On the one hand, interest rate hikes and geopolitical risks have had a huge impact on the global economy, leading to slower economic growth, rising inflation, intensified debt crises, and increased social instability. On the other hand, the development of the digital economy, low-carbon economy and regional value chains has brought new impetus to the global economy, promoted the optimization of the economic structure, and created new business models and employment opportunities. In such a turbulent era, the trend of the global economy will depend on how governments and central banks respond to crises and seize opportunities. How to coordinate interests? First, the growth rate of the global economy in 2024 will be slower than in 2023, but will still remain at a relatively moderate level. It is predicted that the global GDP growth rate will drop slightly to 2.8% in 2024 from about 3% in 2023. This is mainly due to the following four reasons: 1. Geographical risks have caused supply shocks to the global economy, causing economic activities to not fully return to normal levels, but to remain in an inefficient state. For example, frictions between Russia and Ukraine and conflicts between Palestine and Israel have brought uncertainty and disruption to global energy supply and trade. 2. The aging of the population in major economies around the world is becoming more and more serious, resulting in a reduction in labor supply and a decline in potential growth rate. For example, the Eurozone has a much older population than the United States, making its economic growth slower and sluggish. 3. In order to control inflation, major central banks around the world continue to raise interest rates and tighten monetary policies, leading to a contraction in credit and a drag on economic growth. For example, the Federal Reserve raised interest rates four times in 2023 and is expected to raise interest rates twice more in 2024, which will increase the real interest rate level in the United States and have a suppressive effect on investment and consumption. 4. Although global trade conditions will improve in 2024 as the global supply chain is repaired, global trade growth will still be difficult to return to normal levels because global trade protectionism and unilateralism still exist, and global trade rules and order remain. Unstable. For example, the trade friction between the United States and China has not been fundamentally resolved, and the trade dispute between the United States and the European Union has not been properly handled. Secondly, the global economic environment in 2024 will be very sensitive and easily affected by uncertain events. On the one hand, the slowdown in economic growth will inevitably be accompanied by an intensification of the game of interests. Competition and conflicts among countries will become more intense, and global governance and cooperation will become more difficult. For example, the United States will usher in a presidential election in 2024, which will affect the domestic and foreign policies of the United States, as well as the global political and economic landscape. On the other hand, in 2024, the relationship between global inflation and employment will undergo major changes, which will affect the policy orientation and market expectations of major global central banks. In 2024, the relationship between global inflation and employment will slip from the steepest part to the concave part. This means that in order to reduce inflation, more employment will need to be sacrificed, unemployment will rise, and economic growth will slow down. This will force the world's major central banks to shift from focusing on inflation to focusing on employment, from tightening policy to easing policy, and from hawkish to dovish. This policy shift will lead to increased market sensitivity to macro policies and increased financial market volatility. For example, if the Fed's policy changes are less than market expectations, U.S. bond yields and the U.S. dollar exchange rate may fluctuate significantly, which will have an impact on global asset prices. In addition, the structure of the global economy will undergo profound changes in 2024, which will bring new risks and opportunities to the global economy. On the one hand, risk factors still exist and require vigilance and prevention. For example, the debt levels of some countries around the world are too high, and the risk of debt crisis is still high. Especially in the context of rising global interest rates, debt repayment pressure will increase. At the same time, some major emerging market countries will face structural challenges in the labor market, including population aging, skills shortages, and rising unemployment, which will affect the quality and efficiency of economic growth, as well as social stability and harmony. On the other hand, opportunities are also emerging that need to be seized and exploited. For example, the development of digital economy and low-carbon economy will provide new impetus for global economic growth, promote the optimization of economic structure, and create new business models and employment opportunities. In 2024, major breakthroughs will be made in the fields of artificial intelligence, renewable energy, and environmental protection technology, which will accelerate the application of artificial intelligence in various industries, improve energy utilization efficiency, and reduce environmental pollution. In addition, the reorganization of global supply chains will also bring new opportunities to the global economy. Due to the intensification of geopolitical risks, the global regional value chain system is taking shape, and more companies will re-evaluate their supply chain strategies to adapt to the new geopolitical landscape and economic competition environment. This will promote intra-regional trade and investment and improve The level of economic integration within the region. To sum up, the global economy in 2024 will show three major characteristics: "slow growth, high sensitivity, and deep transformation." This is an era of both tests and opportunities for governments and central banks of all countries. For those who are unintentional, this means dangers abound; for those who are prepared, it means endless opportunities. What do you think of it? Hide d

[A training class for leading cadres of the industrial and information system to study and implement the spirit of the National Conference on the Promotion of New Industrialization was held in Beijing] On November 21, 2023, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology held a training class for leading cadres of the entire system to study and implement the spirit of the National Conference on the Promotion of New Industrialization. Guided by Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, we must thoroughly study and understand General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important expositions on new industrialization, fully implement the deployment of the National Conference on the Promotion of New Industrialization, unify our thinking, raise awareness, pioneer and innovate, work together, and strive to create and promote new types of industrialization. A new situation in industrialization. Jin Zhuanglong, Secretary of the Party Leadership Group and Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, attended the opening ceremony and gave a special lecture with the theme of "In-depth study and understanding of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important expositions on accelerating the promotion of new industrialization". Jin Zhuanglong pointed out that the Party Central Committee held a national conference on promoting new industrialization from September 22 to 23, and General Secretary Xi Jinping made important instructions. This is the first national conference held with the theme of new industrialization, making comprehensive arrangements for promoting new industrialization in the new era and new journey. General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions are high-level and rich in connotation. They profoundly expound the great significance, important principles and key tasks of promoting new industrialization in the new era and new journey. They have greatly enriched and developed our party’s understanding of the laws of industrialization and have a strong Political, ideological and guiding, it provides fundamental compliance and action guidance for promoting new industrialization. We must further unify our thoughts and actions with the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions and the decisions and deployments of the Party Central Committee, learn deeply and thoroughly understand General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important expositions on new industrialization, grasp the essence and core essence of the thought, and always adhere to the Party’s commitment to promoting new industrialization. provide comprehensive leadership, deeply understand the strategic positioning of promoting new industrialization, firmly anchor the overall goal of promoting new industrialization, accurately grasp the important principles of promoting new industrialization, comprehensively implement the key tasks of promoting new industrialization, and scientifically master the methods and paths of promoting new industrialization. , adhere to the integration of learning, thinking and application, the unity of knowledge, belief and action, and effectively transform the learning results into work measures and practical actions. Jin Zhuanglong pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at the core, our country has deeply implemented the strategy of manufacturing a strong country and achieved historic achievements in the development of new industrialization. China's unique advantages of a complete industrial system, multiple varieties, and large scale are more obvious. The industrial structure has been accelerated, the scientific and technological innovation capabilities have been significantly enhanced, and the comprehensive strength of enterprises has been greatly improved. 5G, manned spaceflight, large aircraft, large cruise ships, high-end medical equipment, etc. A number of major landmark achievements have been made in the field of new energy vehicles, lithium batteries, photovoltaics and other fields. A number of advantageous industries with full industry chain competitiveness have been formed in new energy vehicles, lithium batteries, photovoltaics and other fields. A new historic leap is being achieved in the industry from high-speed growth to high-quality development. The most fundamental reason for these achievements lies in the leadership and helm of General Secretary Xi Jinping and the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. Jin Zhuanglong pointed out that the current world situation and national conditions have undergone profound changes, a new round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial transformation are developing in depth, and strategic opportunities for promoting new industrialization coexist with risks and challenges. The entire system must adapt to the requirements of the times and changes in the situation, fully implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and the deployment of the National New Industrialization Promotion Conference, further clarify the timetable and road map, come up with more powerful policies and measures, and promote new industrialization to continuously achieve new results. . We must make every effort to promote the steady growth of the industrial economy, focus on key industries, give full play to the role of a major industrial province, and consolidate the upward trend. It is necessary to improve the resilience and safety level of industrial and supply chains, coordinate efforts to strengthen weak areas, forge strong areas, and strengthen the foundation to create an independent, controllable, safe and reliable industrial and supply chain. It is necessary to accelerate the improvement of industrial scientific and technological innovation capabilities, systematically deploy key core technology research in key areas, strengthen the main position of enterprises in scientific and technological innovation, and build a high-level industrial scientific and technological innovation platform system. It is necessary to continue to promote the optimization and upgrading of the industrial structure, transform and upgrade traditional industries, consolidate and improve advantageous industries, cultivate and strengthen emerging industries, and plan future industries in a forward-looking manner. It is necessary to vigorously promote artificial intelligence to empower new industrialization, improve digital infrastructure and service systems, accelerate digital industrialization and digital transformation of the manufacturing industry, and promote the deep integration of the digital economy and the real economy. It is necessary to comprehensively promote the green development of industry, steadily promote carbon emission reduction in the industrial sector, build a green manufacturing and service system, and promote resource conservation and efficient utilization. It is necessary to build world-class enterprises, support state-owned enterprises to become stronger, better and bigger, cultivate a group of leading manufacturing enterprises, stimulate the emergence of more specialized and new small and medium-sized enterprises, and promote the integrated development of large and medium-sized enterprises. It is necessary to guide the rational layout of industries, give better play to the role of various parks such as high-tech zones and industrial parks, promote industrial transfer and docking cooperation, and build a number of advanced manufacturing clusters. It is necessary to expand high-level open cooperation, implement the requirements for the comprehensive elimination of restrictions on foreign investment access in the manufacturing sector, create a market-oriented, legal and international first-class business environment, and cultivate new advantages for my country to participate in international cooperation and competition. It is necessary to improve the modernization level of industrial governance, improve industrial policies for the new development stage, strengthen precise and effective financial services, build a team of high-quality talents, and vigorously promote the entrepreneurship and craftsmanship of the new era. Jin Zhuanglong emphasized that promoting new industrialization is a systematic project with a glorious mission and heavy responsibilities. The entire system must unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", strengthen the "four consciousnesses", and firmly "Four self-confidences", achieve "two safeguards", set "three examples", and build a model institution that reassures the Party Central Committee and satisfies the people. We must work hard to improve our abilities, focus on improving political theory ability, strategic thinking ability, systematic thinking ability, dialectical thinking ability, investigation and research ability, comprehensive coordination ability, supervision and implementation ability, and hone excellent work skills. It is necessary to work hard on implementation, implement the "seven-step working mechanism", make good use of the "seven-grasp working method", combine the actual situation of the region and the unit, inherit, consolidate and develop innovatively, systematically plan and focus on the main business, highlight key points and pay close attention to implement. We must work hard to improve the mechanism, adhere to the national game of chess, strengthen coordination and linkage with relevant departments and localities, give play to the important role of local communications bureaus, subordinate units, and subordinate universities, fully mobilize the enthusiasm of all parties, and gather powerful forces to promote new industrialization strength. The training class is planned to be held for four days, using a combination of centralized lectures and group discussions to provide a series of lectures on topics such as industrial innovation, digital transformation of the manufacturing industry, industrial green development, optimization and upgrading of industrial structure, and improving the resilience and safety level of the industrial chain and supply chain. The industrial and information technology departments of all provinces, autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government and cities under separate state planning, and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, the communications administration bureaus of all provinces, autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government, and cities under separate state planning, all units under the ministry, all universities under the ministry, and members of the leadership team of the fund company managed by the ministry , a total of more than 1,100 cadres at the department and division levels of the Ministry of Finance participated in the training at the main venue and branch venues in various locations. AI Artificial Intelligence - Sickle: The self-proclaimed "AI boss" PK chases the big model - Leek: Investors Sickle and Leek - the eternal theme of the stock market is enduring. As the industry has been cold, since receiving a new round of financing in December last year, Shenlan Technology has not received financing in nearly 7 months. As the acquirer, Shenlan Technology was still seeking financing from investment institutions on the eve of Huamai Technology’s private placement plan. It is currently seeking approximately 80 million yuan in financing, but has been denied by the company. Use 50 million of your own funds to leverage a 400 million bank loan to purchase control of a listed company. Will Shenlan Technology be incorporated into the listed company in the next step to achieve a backdoor listing? With the emergence of ChatGPT, artificial intelligence has been pushed to a higher level of focus in the capital market. It is this kind of imagination that has allowed Huamai Technology, with a market value of less than 3 billion, to hit the daily limit 6 times in a row. As the core operating platform of this transaction, Shenlan Holdings looks like a company specially set up to take over Huamai Technology. It was founded on March 21, 2023 and has not yet carried out substantive operating activities. However, there is still little information about the counterparty Shenlan Holdings. Judging from the source of funds from 50 million of its own funds to leverage 400 million of M&A loans, the financial strength is questionable! The Shanghai Stock Exchange asked: About 80% of the funds required for this private placement come from bank loans. Whether it can be promoted will heavily rely on bank credit, resulting in significant uncertainty in the results of this private placement and the transfer of control rights? Nearly 80% of the acquisition funds come from bank loans, indicating that the acquirer lacks financial capabilities and does not rule out the possibility of speculation! There are not many private placements in the market that end without problems. Investors should avoid blindly following the trend to avoid the risk of stock price speculation. Conflicting information disclosure, investors beware of risks. Although the results of Huamai Technology’s private placement and control transfer have not yet been finalized, its stock price has reached the daily limit of 6 times. For this reason, the Shanghai Stock Exchange questioned whether Huamai Technology had other interest arrangements for this private placement, and in the second inquiry letter required the company and relevant parties to make additional disclosures and explain whether the relevant arrangements involved stock price speculation. AI big news express! 1. Baidu Q3 financial report: It will continue to prioritize investment in generative AI. Today, Baidu released its third quarter financial report, showing third quarter revenue of 34.447 billion yuan and net profit attributable to Baidu of 7.3 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 23%. The financial report mentioned that Baidu will continue to prioritize investment in AI in the future, especially generative AI and basic models. It is reported that the API call volume of Baidu Wenxin large model has increased exponentially. Currently, Wenxin Yiyan has 70 million users and covers 4,300 scenarios. The usage of Baidu AI native applications has increased significantly. 640,000 creators of Baidu App have used AI-assisted creation tools to produce 14 million pieces of content, which has received 30 billion views. The number of users of Baidu Netdisk "Yun Yiduo" has reached 20 million, and Baidu Wenku The cumulative number of users using the new AI functions exceeds 30 million. 2. Vivo Qianxun AI Assistant is officially launched in the app store. Vivo announced in the official community yesterday that the vivo Qianxun AI Assistant based on the blue heart model is officially launched in the app store. Regardless of brand, all mobile phone users can download and use it. According to reports, vivo Qianxun supports AI dialogue to help users obtain knowledge and information efficiently in multiple application scenarios; AI inspiration provides inspiration creation tools such as social media copywriting creation, PPT outlines, Chinese-English translation, and life tips. 3. OpenAI customers are considering turning to companies such as Microsoft and Google. According to foreign media The Information reported today, people familiar with the matter revealed that over the weekend after OpenAI fired former CEO Altman, more than 100 OpenAI customers contacted its competitor Anthropic, and some Customers contacted Google, Microsoft and Cohere. Another person familiar with the matter said that before Altman was fired, OpenAI's flagship client Morgan Stanley had already planned to move more of its AI software to Microsoft's Azure cloud and had been in regular contact with Anthropic. 4. Over 95% of employees requested the resignation of the OpenAI board of directors. According to OpenAI employees, more than 740 of OpenAI’s 770 employees have signed an open letter to the board of directors, demanding that the board of directors resign and reinstate former CEO Altman and former president Brockman. , otherwise they will resign and join Microsoft. 5. Peking University and other open-source large visual model Video-LLaVA According to Qubit reports, yesterday, Peking University and other teams open-sourced the large visual language model Video-LLaVA, which aligns image and video representations into a unified visual feature space, and performs on 13 image and video benchmarks achieve advanced performance. It is reported that Video-LLaVA did not use paired video and picture data during the training process, but after training, the model showed the ability to understand pictures and videos at the same time. Video-LLaVA has achieved multiple image and video benchmark SOTA, exceeding Video-ChatGPT results by 5.8%, 9.9%, 18.6% and 10.1% respectively on MSVD, MSRVTT, TGIF and ActivityNet video question and answer data sets. 6. Guangdong issued a three-year action plan for the construction of the "Digital Bay Area" Today, the General Office of the Guangdong Provincial People's Government issued a notice on the issuance of a three-year action plan for the construction of the "Digital Bay Area". The plan mentions creating a gathering place for digital talents and strengthening the assessment and training of AI talents. Accelerate the cluster development of the digital energy industry in the Bay Area, encourage leading companies to build joint laboratories around key areas such as AGI and high-end computing power construction, and plan and launch a computing power partnership plan. Encourage enterprises and social forces to carry out AGI research and construction, and build an open, integrated and innovative ecosystem with the ability to lead development. Promote the construction of a new generation of national and provincial AI open innovation platforms in the fields of medical imaging, intelligent vision, basic software and hardware, and inclusive finance. Relying on the scale and technological advantages of the information industry, communications industry, and computer software industry in the Greater Bay Area, we will vigorously develop key digital economy industries such as cloud computing, big data, Internet of Things, blockchain, and AI. Taking the Hetao as a pilot project, we will carry out digital cooperation in industries such as life and health, AI, data, advanced manufacturing, and new energy. Support Guangzhou and Shenzhen in promoting the construction of the national new generation AI innovation and development pilot zone and the national AI innovation application pilot zone to create a source of AI technology innovation. 7. MediaTek Dimensity 8300 was released to support generative AI for the first time. Today, MediaTek released the new generation of mid-range mobile phone SoC Dimensity 8300. At the press conference, Xiaomi Group President Lu Weibing released the Dimensity 8300-Ultra chip jointly customized by Xiaomi and MediaTek, which focuses on improving the AI performance of mobile phones. MediaTek said that among products of the same level, Dimensity 8300 supports generative AI for the first time. It is said that Dimensity 8300 can locally run a large model with 10 billion parameters to realize text creation, image generation and other functions. 8. Kyligence Intelligent Indicator Platform deploys a number of domestic large-scale models. Today, big data analysis and indicator platform provider Kyligence Information (Kyligence) held an online digital intelligence forum and product launch conference to upgrade the intelligent one-stop indicator platform KyligenceZen and AI The digital assistant KyligenceCopilot has a series of enterprise-level capabilities, including officially supporting a variety of domestic large models from Zhipu AI, Baichuan Intelligence and other companies, supporting multiple deployment methods such as enterprise-level private deployment, as well as full life cycle management of indicators and data permission control. , intelligent caching and many other capabilities to help enterprises build a safe and reliable enterprise-level indicator platform. The latest version of KyligenceZen integrates AI large models, business models, indicator management, indicator processing, data services and other capabilities. Enterprises can choose different deployment methods such as SaaS, cloud deployment and local private deployment according to the situation. 9. Changhong released the first AI platform for smart home appliances based on large models. According to a post on the WeChat public account of Changhong Company, on November 20, a press conference for the Changhong Smart AI Platform was held. At the meeting, Changhong released the world’s first AI platform for smart home appliances based on large models. Yunfan. According to reports, the Yunfan AI platform has five major capabilities: multi-dimensional perception, multi-understanding, multi-task management, multi-mode interaction, and content stimulation. Currently, Changhong's 8K series, ARTIST star foil series, and 288Hz super feather speed series TVs have been installed in the first batch. In addition, Changhong also released a TV with super connectivity capabilities - the world's first Starlight TV. 10. OnePlus launches AI music studio Yesterday, OnePlus launched an AI music studio overseas, which can generate music through text. Users only need to click "Create Music", select their favorite genre, mood and theme, and provide some prompt words, and in a few minutes, the AI will create the music, lyrics and music video. 11. CITIC Securities: AI will begin to be fully implemented in 2024.
