A number of writers collectively filed a lawsuit in the Manhattan Federal Court in the United States, accusing the technology company Microsoft and the artificial intelligence chatbot ChatGPT developer OpenAI of copyright infringement. The filing party accused OpenAI of copying tens of thousands of non-fiction books without authorization to train its large language model, so that services such as ChatGPT can respond to text commands. Microsoft is also deeply involved in training and developing related models, and it must also bear responsibility. Ask the court to order the two companies to compensate for monetary losses and prohibit related infringements. This lawsuit was led by Sancton, a writer and entertainment magazine editor. His lawyer issued a statement, saying that the AI platforms owned by the two companies are extremely valuable, but they refused to pay the authors, describing the foundation of OpenAI as coming from copyright infringement. Rampant theft. This is the first lawsuit against OpenAI that also accuses Microsoft. OpenAI declined to respond because the case has not yet been decided; Microsoft has not commented yet. Hide d

Among the two new faces on the board of directors, Bret Taylor has not expressed much attitude towards AI supervision, but given that OpenAI employees asked him to join the board of directors in an open letter, Bret Taylor should not be a conservative. As a representative of right-wing economists, Larry Summers has always opposed excessive government regulation, and he cannot be a conservative. As the largest investor, Microsoft is also rumored to be getting a seat on the future board of directors. Coupled with Sam Altman and Greg Brockman who are destined to return to the board of directors, the conservatives will undoubtedly lose all power in the OpenAI board of directors after the change. Published the headline article: "OpenAI is always wary of Altman" Sam Altman returns in style. On the evening of Tuesday, the 21st local time, OpenAI released big news on social platforms: Altmann returned to OpenAI and resumed his role as CEO, and the board of directors also underwent a major change. The new board of directors currently consists of three people, namely: Bret Taylor, who has served as an executive at Facebook, Twitter, and Salesforce, as chairman; Larry Summers, an American economist and former Treasury Secretary (Larry Summers); and Quora founder Adam D’Angelo, the only remaining old board member. Altmann remains as CEO but does not return to the board of directors. Along with him, Greg Brockman, the former chairman of OpenAI, who was kicked out by the old board of directors last Friday local time, also released a message on the X platform to confirm his return to OpenAI. But he only said "backtocoding" and did not say that he would return to the board of directors. At this point, with the exception of DeAngelo, all members of the old board of directors have been eliminated, and the new board of directors consists of three external directors and no internal directors from OpenAI. Before last Friday, OpenAI's original board of directors consisted of six people, three of whom were internal directors and three were external directors. On Friday, the old board of directors launched a "surprise attack" and suddenly kicked Altmann and Brockmann out of the board of directors and dismissed Altmann from his position as CEO, leaving only OpenAI co-founder and chief scientist Ilya Suzkovi ( IIyaSutskever) one inside director and three outside directors. In the days since then, the story has frequently reversed. After experiencing employee turmoil, investor pressure, negotiations and negotiations breaking down, Altman and Brockman joining Microsoft, and 90% of employees signing a joint letter to "force out the board of directors", Altman regained the CEO position and returned to OpenAI with Brockman. In that powerful joint letter, the signed employees gave the board of directors two choices: either bring Altman and Brockman back and replace the board of directors; or more than 700 of us leave and follow Altman to Microsoft. Obviously, the result of the new round of confrontation was that the employees succeeded in forcing the company to leave the company. Among them, new member of the board of directors, Brett Taylor, was also one of the newly nominated candidates. Altman and Brockman celebrated in a post on Obviously this is the best path for me and the team." Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella also sent his blessings. At this point in the story, this sensational "infighting" incident within a Silicon Valley star company seems to have ended with Altman's overwhelming victory. But is it really over? If you take a closer look, it is not difficult to find that all the new directors are ruthless, and the "big bug" in the company that drove Altman away has not yet been fixed. The question is, is this big BUG really a BUG? Artificial intelligence will obviously have a major impact on mankind in the future. Is it really right for artificial intelligence leaders like Altman to remove the sword hanging above their heads? OOpenAI is always wary of Altman.

Why did our country refuse to join Russia in smashing the "US imperial system"? Just from the perspective of industrial strategy: introducing foreign capital into China's leading companies in this field and competing with local companies as catfish is an important part of our industrial policy. For example, Apple was introduced in the smartphone field, Tesla was introduced in the electric vehicle field (and it was fully owned by the other party), and now Microsoft (openai) is introduced as a catfish in the AI field. Without the introduction of top foreign investment in the field of competition, it will be difficult for local companies to truly become stronger. This is also one of the important reasons why India, which likes to take advantage and is short-sighted, can hardly outperform China in industrial development. To sum up, our country is currently in the system built by the US imperialism and can still make profits, or at least the advantages outweigh the disadvantages. This is why we have not raised the bar for the time being. At the same time, the current system has done more harm than good to American imperialism, at least in some areas. Therefore, the US imperialists began to overturn the situation locally. This is a very strange thing: China often maintains the existing system and international order (the U.S. imperial system), but it is the U.S. imperialism that destroys this system that it led and created back then. Angel investor and expert in the field of artificial intelligence Guo Tao analyzed to 21 reporters that large model applications are still in the early stages of commercialization, and many profit models are not clear, such as charging forms and pricing ranges. He believes that now opening up applications to the C-side is more aimed at accumulating data and user groups and improving models. As technology maturity increases, commercialization will accelerate. "Moving towards the B-end is the only way under the current industrial ecology." Guo Tao pointed out that many companies that develop large models have accumulated a large number of B-end enterprise users. It is more efficient to extend corresponding services based on the original customers. The way. Moreover, large model applications are currently charged on a per-module basis, and there are no major technical barriers to services such as marketing and data analysis. After developing a general large model, enterprises can do appropriate data training in vertical subdivisions... Hide d

The recent "Gongdou Drama" in which the founder of OpenAI resigned has once again shown us that balancing the interests of shareholders, employees, operators, boards of directors and users is not an easy task for any company. If you are not careful, , it may endanger the company's future development. These days I am just reviewing the two books "From 0 to 1" and "The Difficulties of Starting a Business". The authors, Peter Thiel and Ben Horowitz, are both top venture capital tycoons in Silicon Valley. The book shares a lot of their experiences in entrepreneurship, investment and management. It is worth learning and referring to. I took the time to sort it out and share it with everyone. Technological innovation investment is the process of finding innovative companies with disruptive potential that are changing the existing industrial structure and business models. This investment approach focuses on technological innovation and model revolution, as they are expected to form a long-term moat by occupying a competitive advantage in the market. Ke Chuang 100 ETF (588190) has been in full swing recently. If we take it apart, we have to admit that investing in Ke Chuang 100 ETF (588190) requires extremely deep knowledge. For us ordinary people to succeed in the technological innovation investment paradigm, we must find a balance between winning rate and probability. Not only do the vast majority of retail investors not have enough capital to reach the threshold of the Science and Technology Innovation Board, but also because it is very difficult to select stocks on the Science and Technology Innovation Board, they also need to spend a lot of energy to improve their awareness. In this context, Science and Technology 100 ETF (588190) is a good tool that can match the three strategic emerging industries of medicine, technology and new energy with one click. At the same time, as highlighted in the aforementioned books, successful entrepreneurship and investing require a well-thought-out strategy, determination, and a spirit of continuous improvement. In the field of science and technology, innovation is the driving force for sustainable development, so we must have the courage to break through conventions and create new value. "From 0 to 1" Venture Capital 1. The biggest secret in venture capital is: the return on the best investment of a successful fund must be equal to or exceed the sum of all other investment objects. 2. Venture capitalists tend to spend more time on the companies with the most problems than on the most successful companies. 3. Now when I consider investing in a startup, I look at its founding team. Complementary technical skills and talents are important, but so is how well the founders understand each other and how well they work together. 4. Simply put, the value of a company today is the sum of the profits it will create in the future. (To correctly value a company, one must also convert future cash flows into today’s value, because the present value of the same amount of funds is more valuable than the period value.) Corporate development strategy 1. “Happy families are always similar, unhappy families are always alike. Families have their own misfortunes.” In business, the opposite is true. Businesses succeed for different reasons: each monopoly achieves monopoly status by solving a unique problem; but businesses fail for the same reason: they cannot escape competition. 2. Entrepreneurs often underestimate the significance of gradually developing the market. In fact, the market needs to be gradually expanded in a disciplined manner. The most successful companies first dominate a specific niche market and then expand into similar markets. Their entrepreneurial stories are similar, and they all gradually expand from their core business. 3. The combination of brand, scale, network effects and technology can create a monopoly company, but to make the company work, you need to carefully select the market and expand the scope carefully. 4. The perfect target market for a startup is a small, specific group of people with almost no other competitors. Any large market is a bad choice, and a large market where there are already other competitors is even worse. 5. A person with a clear goal will often choose the one thing that should be done most and concentrate on doing it well. Instead of working tirelessly only to become incompetent, it is better to work hard to cultivate strength in order to dominate. 6. It is better to be bold than mediocre and conservative; a bad plan is better than no plan; it is difficult to make money in a competitive market; marketing and product are equally important. 7. Competition causes us to overemphasize past opportunities and blindly repeat past patterns. 8. If you prioritize short-term growth, you'll miss the most important question: Will your company still be around in 10 years? Numbers alone can’t tell you the answer: you have to think hard about the essential characteristics of your company. Organizational Management 1. To find the reasons for disunity within the company, it is useful to distinguish the following three concepts: 1) Ownership: Who legally owns the company's assets? 2) Management rights: Who actually manages the day-to-day affairs of the company? 3) Control: Who formally manages the affairs of the company? 2. If someone is willing to have partial ownership of your company instead of a cash salary, it shows that they are willing to commit to increasing the value of the company in the long term. Stocks, while not the best way to motivate employees, are the best way for founders to keep the company together. 3. If you can explain why your company's mission is exciting, you'll attract the employees you need. 4. Time is the most valuable asset. It is not worth wasting time on people who cannot cooperate for a long time. If you can't build lasting relationships at work, you've wasted your time—even from a purely financial perspective. 5. Defining roles can reduce conflicts. Most conflicts in the company are caused by colleagues competing for the same position. 6. The fewer people on the board of directors, the better. The smaller the board, the easier it is for directors to communicate, reach consensus, and provide effective oversight. However, this effectiveness means that in any conflict, a small board can oust management. That's why it's critical to choose your directors carefully: Every member of the board counts. A single problematic director can cause you misery and may even jeopardize the future of your company. [: Board members expressed different opinions] According to The Paper: OpenAI's "coup drama" that spanned five days and experienced reversals and reversals ended in an "attempted coup". Silicon Valley, which was on the front line of "eating melons", wasted no time in sleeping and eating. The masses may also finally get a good night's sleep. At midnight local time on November 21, the emerging American artificial intelligence giant OpenAI announced that it had reached an agreement in principle. Former CEO Sam Altman (Sam Altman) will return to the company as CEO, and "form a team led by Chairman of the Board Bret Taylor, Larry Summers and New Board of Directors composed of Adam D'Angelo". The new board of directors only retains Quora CEO Adam D'Angelo, and as some relevant people previously revealed, Bret Taylor, the former co-CEO of cloud software giant Salesforce and former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers will join OpenAI’s new board of directors. OpenAI pointed out in the statement that it is cooperating to discuss relevant details and thanks for your patience. Foreign media reported that according to relevant sources, the new small board of directors will review and appoint a board of directors of up to nine people, and the management of Ultraman and OpenAI have agreed to hire an external independent law firm. Conduct an investigation. Some netizens observed that, perhaps out of excitement, OpenAI directly called Ultraman "Sam" in the first version of the tweet, and then changed it to the full name of "Ultraman Sam" a few minutes later. On the OpenAI official website, as of press time, the first news on the homepage is still "OpenAI announces management changes" that started everything on the 17th. After the announcement was released, Altman quickly forwarded it with love and "salute" symbols, and posted: "I love OpenAI, and everything I have done in the past few days has been to maintain the integrity of this team and its mission. When I When I made the decision to join Microsoft on Sunday night, it was clear that this choice was the best for me and the team. With the support of a new board of directors and Satya (Microsoft CEO), I look forward to returning to OpenAI and working with Microsoft on We will continue to develop on the basis of strong cooperation." Taylor, who is about to join the new board of directors, also retweeted OpenAI's announcement, while Summers' last tweet was still from a week ago. Greg Brockman, former president of OpenAI, also quickly forwarded and commented: "Amazing progress has been made today, and we will be stronger and more united than ever." Later, he also said: "We are returning to OpenAI & will start programming tonight." At nearly 2 a.m. local time, the excited Brockman posted another photo with OpenAI employees: "We are finally back." Later, the official OpenAI account also forwarded it This photo is accompanied by the most classic sentence in the company's current turmoil: "OpenAI is nothing without employees." Microsoft CEO Satya, who once offered an "olive branch" to Altman and Brockman Satya Nadella did not repost OpenAI’s announcement, but retweeted Altman’s tweet, expressing satisfaction with the result: “We are excited about the changes in OpenAI’s board of directors. We believe this is a path to a more stable and wealthy company. Insightful and effective management is a critical step. Sam, Greg, and I have discussed and agreed that they have important roles on the OpenAI leadership team to work together to ensure that OpenAI continues to thrive and carry forward its mission. We look forward to this strong collaboration "Basically, provide customers and partners with the value of next-generation AI." Previously, Nadella has publicly stated that he will provide support for Ultraman, no matter where he ends up choosing. Some analysts have said that the turmoil in OpenAI will definitely have a negative impact on Microsoft, as the largest shareholder and partner, and after that, Microsoft is likely to take the opportunity to fight for a board seat. The two interim CEOs who were successively promoted by the board of directors in the past five days also responded positively to the matter. Among them, Mira Murati, the first interim CEO and chief technology officer, quickly forwarded OpenAI’s announcement and attached a blue heart symbol. Previously, it was reported that Mulati had been working hard to bring Altman and Brockman back to the company during his tenure as interim CEO. After Nadella invited Altman and others to join Microsoft on November 20, she, like many other executives who supported Altman, tweeted that "OpenAI is nothing without employees." Some analysts also said that if Altman and Brockman join Microsoft, Mulati is likely to follow them to change jobs. Regardless of his true feelings in his heart, Emmett Shear, the second interim CEO to be brought on board by the board of directors and the former CEO of Amazon’s live game streaming platform Twitch, also expressed satisfaction with the result: “When I joined OpenAI , I'm not sure what the right path is. This path will maximize safety while also being responsible to all stakeholders. I'm happy to be part of the solution." In the comment area, some netizens complained "Early You should broadcast your meeting live on Twitch." Some netizens "comforted" him: "You can write that you were the CEO of OpenAI on your resume in the future." A person familiar with the matter revealed to foreign media that during the negotiations with OpenAI, Sher's Joining was a big turning point. After the dust settled, the happiest people were naturally the OpenAI employees and external investors who supported Ultraman's return. They could finally spend the next Thanksgiving holiday without any burden. Venture capital firm Thrive Capital said Ultraman's return "is the best outcome for the company, its employees, those building on their technology and the world at large." On the other hand, for the four board members who dismissed Altman at the time, this result must not have been what they were happy to see. Ilya Sutskever, the chief scientist of OpenAI who had "rebelled" to Ultraman's side during the process, only forwarded some relevant content on X and did not express his position. Quora CEO Adam D'Angelo, who will be "retained", only forwarded the announcement, and the content of technology entrepreneur Tasha McCauley's X account is not disclosed to the public. In addition, Helen Toner, who is suspected by some analysts to be a key figure in the operation to remove Ultraman, only wrote one sentence when forwarding OpenAI's announcement: "Now, we can all have a sleep." As for OpenAI As for Microsoft's competitors and other "melon-eating" people, everyone feels reassured and exhausted by this reversal of the ending, and they are also more curious about how OpenAI, whose reputation has been damaged, will develop next. Elon Musk, who has always been "venomous", naturally did not give up the opportunity to comment. Ten minutes after the announcement of OpenAI, he wrote on X: "What a complicated web we have weaved." This sentence is very It may be a reference to the poem "Marmion" by Scottish novelist and poet Sir Walter Scott, which reads: "Oh, what a tangled web we weave, when once we When the deception begins.” Later, Musk responded with laughing and crying emojis to comments from netizens complaining that OpenAI was “still a terrible board of directors” and “can’t wait to watch Season 2.” Under the comment "This is like telling you at the end of the movie that everything was just a dream", Musk wrote: "Compared with merging with Microsoft, it should be better for the world if OpenAI can maintain (semi-)autonomy. Entrepreneurship Observation: Founders are the soul of start-ups - Sam Altman will join Microsoft, OpenAI employees jointly called for the resignation of the board of directors. The previously predicted bridge did not appear, Sam Altman did not return, and he quickly found a new destination as Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella announced on social platforms on November 20 that he will continue to be committed to cooperation with OpenAI and looks forward to getting to know OpenAI’s new leadership team and working with them. Nadella also announced that Sam Altman and Greg Brockman and their colleagues will join Microsoft to lead a new advanced artificial intelligence research team. On November 20, hundreds of OpenAI employees wrote to the board of directors, saying The company's firing of Sam Altman and Greg Brockman undermines the company and its mission as a whole, and the board's actions have demonstrated the board's inability to oversee OpenAI. The employees said in a joint letter that they hope the board of directors will resign and a new qualified board of directors will be formed. These employees also said they may resign and join Altman and Brockman's team at Microsoft unless all current members of the board of directors resign and reinstate Altman and Brockman in their positions regardless of what happens next. Changes, this generative artificial intelligence company will definitely be severely weakened, and the departure of Sam Ultraman will definitely make the future of this company worrying, and it will have a strong competitor out of thin air. Reflecting on the current situation, founders should do the following: 1. Founders must have absolute control over the company. OpenAI is still a relatively ideal company. Sam, like Jobs and Musk, is a maverick. He has created a maverick corporate structure for OpenAI. Their highest authority is the board of directors, which is non-profit. OpenAlNonprofit has complete control. The company that launched GPT was only a for-profit subsidiary controlled by him, paving the way for his dismissal. 2. Team unity is particularly important. Infighting is the biggest hidden danger of a company. No matter what angle you look at this incident, it is a problem within the company, which is not united and unified. Many people speculate that this was started by chief scientist Ilya leading three non-employee directors. Therefore, for entrepreneurs, building a good team is very important and is the most basic guarantee of success. 3. Fully coordinate with stakeholders. After this incident, various interest groups later had disagreements. As a result, conflicts intensified due to mutual games in the later period. Sam's maverick personality determined that he was not capable enough in this area. The "danger" of OpenAI is Microsoft's "machine". Previously, Microsoft was only a tenant of OpenAI, not the owner. Cooperation with OpenAI has become a sword hanging over Microsoft's head. The more OpenAI advances, the more dangerous Microsoft becomes. However, generative AI is too important to Microsoft. Not only has it invested heavily in OpenAI, but it has also embedded large GPT models in most of its products. There are gaps and rifts within OpenAI, and this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for Microsoft.

[] On the 22nd local time, OpenAI posted on social media that Sam Altman, one of the company’s founders and former CEO, will return to OpenAI as CEO.

It took 12 years for Steve Jobs to return to Apple, but it only took 5 days for Altman to return to OpenAI. Let me highlight three points: Left point: the drama of a quick reversal. Altman's story is like a roller coaster, from being fired to announcing his joining Microsoft, and finally returning to the position of CEO of OpenAI, demonstrating the power of rapid change and decision-making in modern enterprises. It's not that I don't understand, the world is changing fast, too fast. When Ultraman joined Microsoft, I was still sighing sadly: Will he join a big factory at the end of the universe? Now that we are returning, it seems we still have to believe and have light. Right point: This palace battle of OpenAI is a battle between conservative and radical artificial intelligence. The Ilias are conservatives, and what they want is an "AI paradise" that is almost free of "commercial sludge"; the Ultramans are radicals, and what they want is a sustainable commercial company. On this premise We must take into account the vision of benefiting mankind in an appropriate manner. Facts have proved that development is the last word. Incidentally, Altman's reinstatement highlights the influence employees have in modern corporate decision-making. OpenAI employees threatened to resign collectively to express their support for Altman, which was unimaginable in the era of Steve Jobs. Next point: the close connection between the founder and the fate of the business. Both Jobs and Altman attest to the tremendous influence founders have on corporate culture and innovation direction. Their return is not only a personal victory, but also symbolizes a major shift in corporate strategy and development direction. Although these two stories take place in different eras, they both tell the truth about the close relationship between founders and the fate of their companies. I have a small rule when buying stocks. I never buy a company whose founder is not the CEO. In fact, it is for a similar reason. In the past few days, I have been watching this OpenAI palace battle scene every day. At first I thought it was a little monster fighting Ultraman, episode after episode. In the end, it was discovered that Ultraman was the one fighting the monster, and the board of directors was that monster! Is this script written by ChatGPT? LLiu Xingliang’s Weibo videoCollapse d

Let me sort out OpenAI’s revenge palace drama using the legend of Zhen Huan, so that you can quickly substitute the characters. Main characters: OpenAI’s former CEO Sam Altman (Zhen Huan) OpenAI’s former president Reg Brockman (Shen Meizhuang) OpenAI’s chief scientist Ilya Sutskvi (Queen) OpenAI’s chief technology officer Mira Mulati (concubine Jing) OpenAI independent director Adam DeAngelo (An Lingrong) Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella (fourth uncle) Twitch co-founder Emmett Hill (Ning Guiren) and the whole process OB’s Musk (King Guojun) please: You can see the specific composition of OpenAI in our video: I won’t go into details here. In short, the owners like Microsoft are "rich but not powerful" and the board of directors are "powerful but not rich". Before the incident, the board of directors consisted of six people: Zhen Huan, Shen Meizhuang, the Queen, and Qi Fei Anling Rongqi. Zhen Huan and Shen Meizhuang are radicals. They will engage in various financings to invent new products that will shock the world. The four queens and others are conservatives and are technology parties who are worried about the harm that AI development will cause to society. The text begins: -Without the court’s knowledge, the Harem Board of Directors suddenly announced the removal of Zhen Huan from her position as CEO because she was “always not candid in her communications with the Board of Directors, which hindered the Board’s ability to perform its duties.” Concubine Jing serves as interim CEO. At the same time, Shen Meizhuang was also kicked out of the board of directors in his absence. -Shen Meizhuang must be on the same front as Zhen Huan, so he took the initiative to resign. And he is considering creating another harem with Zhen Huan. -This inexplicable reason is puzzling to the whole world, and even Concubine Jing does not understand it. She, Concubine Duan, Xin Guiren and other senior executives asked the board of directors to resign and restore Zhen Huan's status. -The queen is considered to be the leader of this palace change. At the same time, senior executives of Sannomiya and Liuyuan all received invitations to serve as interim CEOs, but they all declined. - After Zhen Huan was deposed, she returned to her home. Jin Xi, Huan Bi, Wen Shichu and Xiao Yunzi also followed. Even Concubine Jing and others also went to Zhen Huan's home to discuss returning to the harem. -The fourth master of the previous dynasty and others were angry when they learned about this. He tried to put pressure on the board of directors and demanded that Zhen Huan be reinstated. It can also be seen here that no matter how independent the harem is, it cannot be without interference from the four uncles. -With the mediation of the Fourth Master, Zhen Huan returned to the harem as a "visitor" to negotiate with the board of directors, and Shen Meizhuang was also invited to join. But after talking for a day, Yushan sent round after round, but there was no result. - OB's Guojun Wang Rui commented on the matter. He believed that the board of directors must give a clear reason for taking such severe action. - Negotiations broke down. The queen announced that Zhen Huan would no longer serve as CEO, and the interim CEO was changed from Concubine Jing to Guiren Ning. It is said that the harem notified everyone to hold a meeting with Ning Guiren, but the reply received was a middle finger emoji, and only about ten people were present. -The Fourth Master spoke, and Zhen Huan Shen Meizhuang directly entered the court to lead a new harem. And anyone from the original harem can come if they want to join. -95% of the harem staff have signed a joint letter asking the board of directors to resign and restore Zhen Huan to her position, otherwise they will all go to the new harem of the previous dynasty. Even the Queen signed it. - Rhythm master Jing Fei made an important statement: "A harem without employees is nothing", triggering a large number of reposts. -The queen completely repented and said that she never wanted to harm the harem. Zhen Huan and Shen Meizhuang are all supportive. These three should have reconciled. -We are currently at a standstill. The prerequisite for Zhen Huan and Shen Meizhuang to return is that the board of directors must resign. The fourth uncle is very busy. He has already contacted Yu Shufang as an office space. He has also upgraded the hardware and welcomes hundreds of people to join at any time. -The board of directors began to consider mergers, but they were rejected. At present, the representative of the board of directors who is still insisting on his own opinion is An Lingrong. -Zhen Huanfang, Ning Guiren, and An Lingrong had another negotiation. Ning Guiren said that if there is no sufficient reason to remove Zhen Huan, then he will leave and not be willing to serve as interim CEO again. -Finally, Concubine Xi returned to the palace! Zhen Huan remains the CEO, and a new initial board of directors is established, including former Salesforce co-CEO Bret Taylor (chairman of the board), former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers and An Lingrong. -The fourth uncle expressed his satisfaction, let’s make dumplings and smash them together! OpenAI co-founder and former president Greg Brockman posted on X (Twitter) today: We are back. On November 20, Microsoft CEO and Chairman Satya Nadella issued a statement stating that Sam Altman, Greg Brockman (Greg Brockman) and their colleagues will join Microsoft to lead a new advanced artificial intelligence research team. Coming out of a small town, he studied at Harvard and MIT, dropped out of school to start a business, and served as the CTO of the Internet payment processing platform Stripe. Brockman's life resume is legendary. In 2008, Brockman entered Harvard to study mathematics and computer science, but when he realized that he could no longer learn more knowledge, he chose to drop out. In 2010, he transferred to MIT to study computer science. But he didn’t stay at MIT for long, and the idea of starting a business began to sprout in his mind. In 2010, after "graduating" from college, Brockman joined the startup Stripe. In May 2015, he left Stripe and began working on independent artificial intelligence projects. After working at Stripe for 5 years, Brockman realized that "AI" was the field he really wanted to devote his life to. After leading Stripe on the right track, he chose to leave. In the same year, Elon Musk, Altman, Brockman and others initiated the establishment of OpenAI to promote the development of artificial intelligence technology. Brockman told Altman his idea of setting up an artificial intelligence company, and the two had similar views. For them, OpenAI was just a somewhat "unrealistic" idea at the time, but soon, a dinner hosted by Altman at SandHill Road created a top team and allowed the idea to be truly implemented. Unexpectedly, I, Ultraman, am back! On the afternoon of November 22, OpenAI announced that it had reached an agreement in principle, and Altman returned to the company as CEO. Ultraman himself and Microsoft have also issued documents confirming this matter. What is going on in this repetitive business farce? To put it simply, the board of directors, which had already had differences with Altman, took advantage of his participation in the APEC meeting to dismiss him at the speed of light. After being kicked out, Ultraman turned around and found Microsoft, the boss behind the scenes. He came up with Lian Wu Kangcao and kicked out the board of directors. So is this a good thing? Not necessarily. When openAI was founded, it was a non-profit company. The core founders and engineers were students of famous American artificial intelligence experts. Student entrepreneurship is always full of idealism. But ideals alone cannot fill your stomach. Altman proposed the concept of a gpt store, which is similar to the Android and Apple app malls. Developers can use openAI technology to develop applications, put them on the shelves for sale, and then obtain revenue sharing. This situation made other people on the board of directors unable to sit still. They agreed to develop an open source AI together to benefit the world, but now you just want to make a fortune. The conflict between the two sides was very fierce. In addition to internal differences, there is actually pressure from the outside of OpenAI, which comes from Microsoft, which invested $12 billion in it. One of the agreements between the two parties requires OpenAI to exclusively use Microsoft Azure cloud services. When the cumulative profit reaches 150 billion US dollars, Microsoft will sell all its shares and turn OpenAI into a complete public welfare institution. Chatgpt’s current monthly revenue is about US$100 million. Even if it increases tenfold, it will take more than 10 years to pay off this debt of gratitude. This time is enough for Microsoft to use AI to rebuild its own intelligent network ecosystem. In order not to become a puppet of a large company, openAI came up with a way to open its own API interface, bypass Microsoft as much as possible, and directly contact customers to increase profits. This also made Microsoft very unhappy. So we will see Ultraman immediately defect to Microsoft after he is out, and the profits will be more attractive to ordinary employees. This farce is probably still a cliché story of capital defeating ideals. Lguozi Albert’s Weibo video is closed d

I adopted an abandoned little orange cat. There was a family in the community who moved and abandoned a little orange cat, which was very dear to them. I have seen too many abuses of cats recently. Children in the community kicked and bullied him. I was afraid that the cat would be hurt outside, so I took him home with my friends. I went to the hospital for a physical examination, deworming, and the iconcon vaccine. Fortunately, I'm relatively healthy! I don’t know if raising a cat depends on your taste. When my friend’s cat food arrived, he was really eating it. It seemed that he was very hungry. He touched it with the bag. At first, he was still protecting the food, but then he ate it. After a few minutes, it didn't respond when I touched it again. I took it home and ordered cat food, cat supplies and cat toys from the Internet. I almost bought everything I needed to buy, cooked rice, and gave it to the little one again. The cat put some egg icons, meat and vegetables in it. It wolfed down the food. After half a month of raising it, it became fatter than before. It looked meaty. The more I looked at it, the more I liked it. Later I found that it had a bad mouth and started to eat it again. I made a guide online and bought a pet-specific Spiri functional cream to prevent cat dental calculus and plaque. After eating it for a week, my mouth no longer smells so bad. It has a light cat food taste and is very convenient to eat once a day. You also don’t need to brush your teeth, which saves time and effort. I appeal to everyone not to abandon cats!!! Don’t abandon any pets!!! Before raising a cat, you must think clearly whether you can always take responsibility. Cats are part of the family and cannot be abandoned at any time. Cat adoption in Xi’an is free! Description of the situation: *Breed: British shorthair cat calico*Gender: Female kitten I bought it, it's been well maintained, and it's probably been vaccinated. *Deworming: There were no parasites when it was first picked up. It should have been dewormed before wandering. As soon as I picked it up, I used Big Pet to deworm it. *The process and basic situation of picking up the cat: The kitten was picked up in the garden of the community on October 15th. It seemed like a close relative when we first met it. I guess it had just been wandering for a few days. Its body was very clean, without parasites or ear mites. There was a trauma at the corner of the left eye. It was probably caused by an infection caused by not being treated while wandering. After a period of treatment, the trauma at the corner of the eye has now healed. The kitten was in good health and was taken to the pet hospital for a simple examination and found no symptoms. The kitten has a very affectionate personality and won't be scratched. It doesn't resist when it comes to cutting nails, cleaning ears, applying medicine to wounds, taking oral medicine, etc. It especially likes to nuzzle and cling to people, and has a very good personality. The cat picker already has several big cats at home. Due to the situation at home, he is unable to adopt them, so the kittens are currently placed at a friend's home. *Special note: I’m not sure what the kitten has experienced before. The kitten will howl when it can’t see people, which is quite unpleasant. After a few weeks of adoption, the situation has eased. I guess it may be a sign of a lack of security after being abandoned. , I went to the hospital for a checkup, and the doctor said it was not caused by illness. Kittens will use cat litter themselves, but it may be that the range of activities in the temporary cage is too small, making it easy for the kitten to step on the litter. It is recommended to use a large litter box with sufficient space. Kittens are so dear and have very good personalities. Domestic breed cats have no ability to survive outside. If they are abandoned, they will never survive the weather in Xi'an! I hope someone with good intentions can give the kitten a home! *Adoption requirements: 1. There must be no cat abuse! 2. Must be a caring, patient, cat-loving adopter 3. No fees will be charged, just hope that the kittens can find a good home 4. Only self-pickup in Xi'an city is accepted 5. It is more difficult for dogs than cats here, because cats can also catch mice or be fed by people, but stray dogs are really driven away wherever they go, and many dogs have children before they are even born... The life span of stray cats is about After two to three years, a stray dog will be very good even if it lasts for one year. Because stray dogs can only rely on garbage, but now the trash cans are made very high, and there is no place for stray dogs to eat. Unless you meet a more conscientious restaurant owner who will feed you some food. Therefore, stray dogs are very, very thin. Except for kittens, all adult cats are actually very fat and strong. (Except for the calico cat, the rest of the cats I feed are not thin. The orange cat can be called very fat. ) and stray cats escape very quickly, so cat abusers specialize in catching smaller cats, because malnutrition causes them to escape slowly. I have always wanted to feed stray dogs, because stray dogs are more pitiful than stray cats, but stray dogs are more afraid of people than stray cats. A stray orange cat (it can even be called a wild cat, its mother was abandoned, and it was born completely in the grass) dares to stand next to me waiting for me to feed it, but stray dogs even if I feed them Freeze-dried fish, when they see me, they have to make sure I'm five or six meters away from them before they dare to eat it. Others think that stray dogs hurt people, but in fact, it is free-range domestic dogs that bite people. Most stray dogs are afraid of people and want to please people, but free-range domestic dogs are very vicious. Most of the free-range dog owners don’t love dogs. Once they find out that their dog has bitten someone, they will lie and say that they have never had a dog, so their dog becomes an unwanted stray dog... What really needs to be dealt with is the person. , I think the dog should be microchipped to determine who the dog owner is. There will be severe fines for abandonment and fines for not keeping the leash. Only in this way can we fundamentally prevent the increase in stray dogs. Hide d

I hope "Today's Cute Dog" will be aired normally next week! I watched episode 5.6 today, which also talks about school bullying. Ironically, Jianan High School (the school where the incident occurred) happened to be rated as a "bullying-free high school" and a banner was posted. The perpetrator happened to be jealous, so he teamed up with his classmates who were doing well to bully the victim. As for why there are less themes related to campus bullying in Chinese movies and TV dramas, I personally guess that one is that campus bullying in my country is indeed not as common as in South Korea, and the other is censorship restrictions. However, we have a large population, so there are quite a few cases of bullying on campus - because I was also a victim. The perpetrators of campus bullying are usually too idle and have a bad heart, so they take out their frustrations on others - similar to those who abuse cats and dogs. In the play, fortunately, the victimized classmates met a responsible teacher like the male protagonist (the male protagonist also suffered from campus bullying when he was a teenager, so he can empathize with it). As for me, my class teacher in the second year of high school was relatively young, and I only gave them ideological education verbally, but the effect was of course very little, and even deepened their resentment towards me (a resentment that came out of nowhere); in the third year of high school, because I was affected to sleep, I slept with another person. Every day I struggle between the contradiction between emotion and rationality. Every day I ask myself whether I am doing the right thing. Are cats and dogs really worthy of people spending a lot of energy to care and love? Are good people really rewarded? Can they really accumulate good deeds? Is it worth it? . Cats and dogs are companion animals. They have intelligence and emotions, and they have become friends of humans over the years. Their existence has brought us a lot of healing and happiness, but at the same time, there are many stray cats and dogs due to |some people abandon them+someone feeds them without sterilizing+disorderly breeding| Stray cats and dogs cannot choose their origin, and it is not their fault that they are homeless. It is not the obligation of any one person or organization to rescue stray animals. Everyone and every unit should sterilize stray cats and dogs in their respective places, feed them at designated locations, and strive to adopt them. Only if everyone in our generation participates in TNR will homelessness be ended in the next generation. Thousands of stray furry children have affected human life and then are dealt with in a simple and crude way. This is not the result that a civilized society should have. Of course, it is impossible for your wishes to be too good. Some students said that we are the minority group and they are the mass group. Although I really don’t want to accept this fact, but... yes. We can't control what others think, so we must control our emotions and protect ourselves from being consumed as much as possible. Do good people really get rewarded? I really hate the word good person. It's hard to be a good person, it takes a lot of effort, and you have to be careful with your tail between your legs. People who are indifferent, cold-blooded, and just watching the fun cannot be singled out, and those who abuse cats and dogs will not be punished by law. Will he really accumulate good deeds? have no idea. As long as it's under your nose, it's hard to ignore it, just to have a clear conscience. Hide d

After going through a crazy cat abuse cyber parade on the Internet, you find a dying and bloody kitten rubbing your palm.

Have you ever had such an experience? Walking alone on the street, I suddenly saw a little stray cat, its eyes full of vigilance and uneasiness, as if there was no corner in this huge world that could provide it with a trace of warmth and safety. So, is there anything we can do for these furry kids? Today, I came to Hangzhou Xianghu Brand Pet Health Research and Development Center with a heart willing to help small animals. This is not only a research and development center, but also a "working paradise" for stray cats full of love and warmth. There is a very special group of kittens here. They once roamed the streets, homeless. But here, not only do they have nothing to worry about, they also have a three-story villa! Brand brand attaches great importance to the actual feeding effect, and all products will undergo strict feeding tests before leaving the factory. They have been cooperating with stray rescue centers before, and recently they built a cat feeding research center, which is a feeding testing center with ceiling-level animal welfare in China. Before the harshest winter arrives, Brand launched an 88-day Warm Winter for Stray Cats at his pet health research and development center! .. It is hoped that with the modest power of the brand, more people will pay attention to those homeless little stray cats. The winter of 2023 is very short, only 88 days, but for many stray cats, this may be their whole life. If stray cats want to survive the winter, there are two very important levels: The first level: fat! Cats need to work hard to find food before the real cold winter arrives, eating themselves fat and storing more fat. Because only in this way can they stay warm in cold weather. Level 2: Hair! With enough fat, after cooling down, the cat can grow thick hair to withstand the coming severe cold. If there is not enough fat storage, then their life is likely to end here. The Brand R&D Center has also set up a "stray cat gas station" so that stray cats around Xianghu Lake no longer live in the open. Friends who are convenient can come here to check in! Just give a high five and donate a pack of cat food to the little strays! You can also receive rescue cat food and give the stray cats around you a full meal! Your little kindness may become a light in their lives✨. Keeping stray cats warm in winter for 88 days! .. An offer that makes Meow’s heart beat.. Be kind to animals.. Refuse to abuse cats and dogs.. I speak out for cats and dogs... Brand. Hide d

To: Xie Zhengyi, Secretary of the Party Committee of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of Jiangsu Province A letter of report regarding Xu Xichun of Zhangjiagang State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission, who refused to perform his duties as an investor, engaged in malpractice for personal gain, abused his power, and caused a loss of 100 million to the country. Xie Zhengyi, Secretary of the Party Committee of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of Jiangsu Province: Zhangjiagang City Xu Xichun, director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission, violated the Enterprise State-owned Assets Law of the People's Republic of China, refused to perform his duties as an investor, engaged in malpractice for personal gain, abused his power, neglected his duties, and caused a loss of 100 million to the country; he was falsely loyal to the party, acted as a two-faced person, protected criminals, and refused to transfer criminal charges Criminal clues; confronting the central government, failing to perform two statutory duties and two safeguarding duties; forgetting all oaths to join the party and the oath to the constitution, and being reasonably suspected of accepting large bribes; committing the crime of malpractice for personal gain and abuse of power; committing malpractice for personal gain and not turning over criminal cases ; Reasonable suspicion of bribery; In accordance with Article 41 of the Constitution of the People's Republic of China, which stipulates people's supervision of the government, I report to the higher authority: "There is a lie in this post, and a police car was sent to arrest me." If I had no evidence, they would have eaten me alive.﹞1 Xu Xichun’s criminal facts: 1. He knowingly knew that the third chairman of Jiangsu Cathay Pacific was guilty of abuse of power by state-owned enterprise personnel, bribery of tens of millions, dereliction of duty to increase losses, and false accusation and frame-up. After reporting to him, he failed to perform his duties stipulated in Article 402 of the Criminal Law, which was a serious dereliction of duty and suspected of a crime. 2. Knowing that Jiangsu Cathay violated the law and caused: 70 million yuan in interest losses, 10 million yuan in judicial bribery, 5 million yuan in post deletion fees, 15 million yuan in reasonable suspicion of bribery to the Supervisory Committee, and a loss of 100 million yuan in state assets. After reporting to him, he did not fulfill the provisions of the State-owned Assets Law. Responsibility, serious dereliction of duty. suspected of committing a crime. 3. After submitting a petition to him, he did not investigate and verify, find out the facts, clarify responsibilities, and present facts and reasons before hearing. He did not even communicate with the petitioner on the phone, so he concluded that it was illegal. Serious violation of Article 42 of the Regulations on Letters and Calls (1) Exceeding or abusing power and infringing upon the legitimate rights and interests of citizens, legal persons or other organizations; (2) Failure to act when required, infringing upon the legitimate rights and interests of citizens, legal persons or other organizations; causing serious consequences If a crime is committed, the directly responsible person in charge and other directly responsible personnel will be dealt with seriously in accordance with regulations and disciplines; if a crime is constituted, criminal responsibility will be pursued in accordance with the law. 2 Please take a look at the higher-level regulatory authorities: Xu Xichun clearly knows the evidence and clues of Jiangsu Cathay’s crimes. He acted as a corruption protection umbrella1 and proved that the court deliberately misjudged the 138 case. 2. Evidence proving that Jiangsu Cathay Zhang Ziyan deliberately misjudged the beneficiaries in 128 cases. 3. Evidence of reasonable suspicion that Zhang Ziyan paid a bribe of 10 million yuan. 4. Evidence that reasonably doubts that Zhang Ziyan paid a deletion fee of 5 million. 5. Zhang Ziyan’s failure to repay the debts confirmed by the court resulted in an increase in losses of 70 million yuan, which was evidence of serious dereliction of duty. 6. Zhang Ziyan manipulated the evidence that the court did not file the case. 7. Evidence that two successive presidents of Zhangjiagang were revoked. 8. Post evidence online to accuse me of picking quarrels and provoking trouble in retaliation to frame me. 9. Evidence and clues showing that former chairman Wang Yongcheng failed to sign an export contract with a foreign businessman when he entrusted an export agent, and that he committed bribery in litigation. 10. The former chairman Tan Qiubin falsely accused me and framed me for 5 years of unjust lawsuits and evidence of bribery. 11. Before Tan Qiubin bribed Yu Dajun, deputy prosecutor of Jiangsu Province, he provided evidence and clues to the Nantong political and legal authorities in handling my unjust lawsuit. 12. Former deputy general manager Jiang Jian assisted chairman Tan Qiubin in falsely accusing me and providing evidence and clues that led to a five-year unjust lawsuit. 13. Huang Jianxin, the former legal counsel of Jiangsu Cathay Pacific, planned and participated in the false accusation and framed me for five years of unjust lawsuit. 14. In 2012, Cheng Yangyang, Chief of the Civil Affairs Section of the Zhangjiagang Procuratorate, participated in the false accusation and framed me for a five-year unjust lawsuit. 15. Evidence of wrongful prosecution. 16. Bribery person: Zhang Ziyan, position, president, Jiangsu Cathay International Group Co., Ltd. 17. Bribery recipient: Yu Aihua, position, former vice president in charge of the Second Civil Division of Zhangjiagang Municipal People’s Court. 18. Bribery recipient: Liu An, position: full-time member of the Zhangjiagang Municipal People’s Court in charge of filing letters and petitions. 19. Bribery recipient: Zhu Jiechun, position, president of Zhangjiagang Municipal People's Court. 20. Bribery recipient: Bai Hongzhong, position, chief judge of Suzhou Intermediate People's Court. 21. Bribery recipient: Zhao Rongzu, position, chief judge of Suzhou Intermediate People's Court. 22. Bribery recipient: Xia Zhengfang, position: President of the Second Civil Division of the Jiangsu Provincial Higher People’s Court. 23. Bribery recipient: Ge Xiaoyan, position: Chief Judge of the Jiangsu Provincial Higher People’s Court. Note: The bribe recipient is at the cadre level, excluding the accepting judge. For details: @ Hengli Electrician Weibo search keywords, Zhang Ziyan. 3 The criminal law basis for Xu Xichun’s lawsuit: Article 397 of the Criminal Law: If a state agency staff member abuses his power or neglects his duties, causing heavy losses to public property, the interests of the country and the people, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years or criminal detention; if the circumstances are particularly serious, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years or criminal detention; if the circumstances are particularly serious, he shall be sentenced to Fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years but not more than seven years. State agency staff members who engage in malpractice for personal gain and commit the crime in the preceding paragraph shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than five years or criminal detention; if the circumstances are particularly serious, they shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than five years but not more than 10 years. Article 402 of the Criminal Law: If an administrative law enforcement officer engages in malpractice for personal gain and fails to hand over a criminal case that should be transferred to judicial authorities for investigation of criminal responsibility, if the circumstances are serious, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years or criminal detention; if serious consequences are caused, he shall be sentenced to Fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years but not more than seven years. Standards for filing a case: The leader of the administrative law enforcement department prevents the transfer; the directly responsible person in charge and other directly responsible personnel do not transfer the criminal case for the purpose of seeking personal gain for the unit, and the circumstances are serious; 4 Hengli Company believes: Xu Xichun engaged in malpractice and abused his power for personal gain. The case of fraud is not transferred to a criminal case. The objective facts are clear and there is reasonable suspicion of large-scale bribery. He is the first person in charge and it is necessary to take responsibility. He performs the investor's duties in accordance with Article 68 of the Enterprise State-owned Assets Law of the People's Republic of China. If an institution commits any of the following acts, its directly responsible manager and other directly responsible personnel shall be punished in accordance with the law: (4) There are other acts that fail to perform the investor's duties in accordance with the law, causing losses to state-owned assets. Article 69 If a staff member of an institution that performs investor duties neglects his duties, abuses his power, or engages in malpractice for personal gain, but this does not constitute a crime, he shall be punished in accordance with the law. Request higher-level regulatory authorities to perform their statutory duties, protect the interests of the country's people, and handle Xu Xichun's illegal behavior in accordance with the law. Sincerely, Xie Zhengyi, Secretary of the Party Committee of Jiangsu Provincial State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission Zhangjiagang Hengli Electrical Co., Ltd. If you can't sleep, write something. After lunch today, I ordered a cup of Mixue Bingcheng after a long time. When I went back to the dormitory to taste it, I felt it didn't taste right and was slightly bitter. So I thought about changing it for a drink. Since I was too embarrassed to talk in person and I had already returned to the dormitory, I decided not to go, so I looked for an online method. There was no useful information in identifying the QR code on the cup, so I resigned myself to it, but I was a little unwilling to stop there. At this time, an idea emerged in my mind, a one-stop service platform. In order for students to have a good experience at school, the school has opened a one-stop service platform so that students have something to say and a place to say it. At this time, I was still undecided, so I clicked on it hesitantly and looked through other posts. Everyone has made good use of this platform, praising, suggesting and complaining, and the school official has also responded below each post. After seeing this, I thought it was okay for me to complain. So I clicked on I have something to say and posted a post. Later, I felt it was inappropriate, so I deleted the post and modified it. The complaint was turned into a suggestion. The cafeteria manager called me the first time she saw it and asked me to delete the post and indicate that she was not at the school and would handle the matter as soon as possible after she went to work in the afternoon. I did not expect it to be so efficient. Back at 3pm, I missed the call from the canteen manager while I was at the double election meeting. They communicated in advance that they would contact me after three o'clock, and when I called back, there was no complaint. The general content of the call was that I would find a time to go to Mixue Ice City together and ask the merchant to make a fresh cup and try it to see if it tasted good. From this, we could judge whether this incident was an accident or an ongoing problem with their ingredients. During this rectification, they took me to their back kitchen to see if the ingredients were fresh and hygienic. This is something I didn't expect. She takes this complaint very seriously and cares about every consumer's feelings. I can't help but feel in my heart that she should be the manager. The manager is worthy of being a manager. Actually, I don’t really want to go, I’m shy and sorry. But I couldn't refuse and had to bite the bullet. Seeing that the three employees were also ready, I seemed to feel a little bit of their nervousness. The whole process went smoothly. In the end, the store manager gave me a cup of milk tea. After returning to the dormitory, I was in a daze for a while, not wanting to do anything. I felt that the energy loss was a bit large, and it took a while to recover. I feel that the canteen manager handled it very well, and the people in Mixue Bingcheng are also very sincere. They always think about this matter unconsciously. Maybe it is because they can't sleep because they are thinking about this matter. I'm wondering if I'm making a fuss out of a molehill. I could have asked them to make a cup again but I chose to complain on the platform. I'm wondering if my complaint is a bit excessive. I'm wondering if the employees who wanted to make that cup of Mixue Ice City will be dissatisfied because of this. My wages were deducted, and I wonder if they will become more strict because of this. I think I consumed it and there is indeed no problem in complaining because of their mistake. But everyone doesn’t want to go to work, so it doesn’t matter if I make a mistake once or muddle along. Can I guarantee 100% energy when I go to work in the future? The employee looked like he had just started working. Could it have some impact on his heart? He even thought about him smoking and cursed in his mind, saying, "Why don't I complain?" He was deducted from his salary and had to memorize the ingredient list even more. . As I write this, I suddenly feel that I am sick. I am thinking about a series of things that may not happen at all. Why am I so embarrassed? Why am I complaining? He just didn't do a good job. I have the right to complain. What am I doing here thinking about it? Is this against PUA? I really don't understand. I don’t know what I was thinking. I don’t know if I regret it. It seems like I regret it. I don’t know. It's indeed a bit too much. I obviously asked them to memorize the ingredient list, but I sympathized with them and couldn't understand myself. I probably won’t go to Mixue Ice City and the shops there for a while. Maybe it won't be possible until they forget my appearance. It’s better not to go this semester. Hide d

[After listening to a health lecture, an 80-year-old woman in Xi’an spent 9,960 yuan to buy 64 pieces of donkey-hide gelatin. “Bai Shoukang” was ordered to close down her business and delete her posts. She was reported in March 2022. The authoritative media “Huashang Daily” published “Xi’an 80-year-old The old lady spent 9,960 yuan to buy 64 pieces of donkey-hide gelatin after listening to a health lecture. "Bai Shoukang" was ordered to close down due to the incident. The article was reported on the 6th floor of Dongguang Building near Huancheng West Road in Xi'an City. Forty or fifty elderly people gathered to listen. A boss from Shandong gave a lecture on donkey hide gelatin. A reporter from the Huashang Daily reported the incident to the Huancheng West Road Food and Drug Administration. In early February this year, 80-year-old Ms. Liang was walking near Hanguangmen in Xi'an City when a young man handed her a flyer and left her contact information. A few days later, a woman contacted her to attend a health lecture, saying it was good for her health. Later, Ms. Liang went to attend a lecture on the 6th floor of Dongguang Building near Huancheng West Road in Xi'an. There were forty or fifty elderly people sitting in the lecture hall, listening to a boss who claimed to be from Shandong to talk about donkey-hide gelatin. For dozens of minutes, I kept talking about how good donkey-hide gelatin is. Ms. Liang was still hesitant to buy it at first. The staff gave her corn flour and other things, so she decided to buy two pieces of donkey-hide gelatin blocks. “It was embarrassing to just accept other people’s stuff. A box of 4 cost 4,980 yuan, so they let me take it.” For two copies, I was charged 9,960 yuan." The reporter found that the same type of Beijing Tongrentang donkey-hide gelatin block sold online for 358 yuan for 250 grams, a price difference of nearly 3.5 times. A reporter from the Huashang Daily accompanied Ms. Liang to Room 6031 on the 6th floor of Dongguang Building as a relative. The "Food Business License" showed that the company was "Xi'an Baishoukang Health Management Co., Ltd." Rice, flour, oil and other items are displayed on both sides of the room, as well as some goods marked "display items". There were more than ten elderly people in the store, some carrying handbags. Two old people said they came to get donkey-hide gelatin. Another old man told reporters that he came here to ask for a refund. "Some time ago, they recommended me to buy camel milk, 5 boxes of camel milk, 24 bottles per box. I spent 20,000 yuan. After the reporter identified himself, the store Several staff members quickly packed up the information and left. Later, a staff member handled a refund for Ms. Liang and handed her 9,960 yuan in cash. A reporter from the Chinese Business Daily reported Ms. Liang’s situation to the relevant departments. Huancheng West Road After the on-site inspection, the Food and Drug Administration stated that in accordance with the provisions of the Food Safety Law, the store was ordered to close and asked the legal representative to submit relevant information to the Food and Drug Administration, and further investigation will follow." said a staff member surnamed Gao, Liang The blood test issue mentioned by the lady may be suspected of "illegal medical practice" and needs to be handled by the Lianhu District Health Bureau. (End) After the blogger reposted the report, many bloggers contacted me recently and asked to delete the post. Some bloggers failed to delete the post and directly sent private messages saying that the article was untrue. They simply chose to report the post, which was eventually deleted. First of all, the blogger is reprinting an authoritative investigation article from Huashang Newspaper. So, what exactly is he trying to hide with this move! The blogger once again issued a solemn reminder to everyone to prevent the elderly at home from being deceived. Nine out of ten people who attend lectures claiming to be health care products are scammers. Hide d

On October 12, 2023, Handan Iron and Steel Group made false claims to the Hebei Provincial Letters and Calls Bureau for the 103rd time in a row. On November 1, 2022, the Beizhangzhuang Town Government made false claims to the Hebei Provincial Letters and Calls Bureau for the 14th time in a row, requesting a thorough investigation! Who will investigate the fraud of Handan Iron and Steel Group? Who is the protector behind Handan Iron and Steel? Request a thorough investigation of the fraud of Handan Iron and Steel Group and the protective umbrella behind Handan Iron and Steel Group, and reissue or compensate for statutory treatment in accordance with the law! During the 2022 all-employee nucleic acid test period, Handan Iron and Steel sent many people in multiple batches to break into private homes day and night, and forced their way into hospital checkpoints to hinder epidemic prevention and control. They called the police 8 times and still refused to evacuate with arrogance. We were threatened and pressured by many departments, and the Internet exposed Posts were frantically deleted, traffic was restricted, and accounts were blocked, and the mobile phone containing the evidence was forcibly taken away and the evidence was destroyed! On June 23, 2022, Zhang Xianzheng, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of Handan Iron and Steel Group, came home and admitted that the chain of evidence was falsified, but refused to compensate or provide any legal treatment. On June 24, he received a threatening call from Handan Iron and Steel Group claiming that he was "not afraid of anything"! Since the complaint, the complaint has been in "Hebei Provincial Letters and Calls Bureau - Hebei Provincial State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission - Hebei Iron and Steel Group - Handan Iron and Steel Group "were idle or false. They kept complaining about Handan Iron and Steel Group's fraud, but they always made Handan Iron and Steel Group both the defendant and the referee, and repeatedly induced people to sign. Then they made up the story but refused to produce any legal evidence. Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. had opened up relationships at all levels in Hebei Province and had been conducting false transactions without our knowledge; on April 22, 2022, the leaders of Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. imposed organizational sanctions and waited until the children went to school and returned home. The workplace exerted pressure and threats, requesting a thorough investigation! My father, Zhang Huisen, is a disabled veteran. He worked at Handan Iron and Steel Equipment Manufacturing and Installation Co., Ltd. from 1991 to the end of 2012. He was awarded advanced status and suffered a work-related injury (hospitalized in Handan Iron and Steel Hospital). He was dismissed by Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. at the age of 60, but Handang Iron and Steel Group never gave him any compensation. I paid any social security and forged a labor dispatch agreement. There was no agreement content, no signature or fingerprint, and no photocopying or taking photos. I was only told that I signed a contract with a labor dispatch company in May 2011. I asked to see the "fake agreement" many times. " text was rejected; (Handan Congtai Ark Human Resources Co., Ltd. and Handan Hongwei Loading and Unloading Service Co., Ltd., which Handan Iron and Steel falsely responded to after the report, were respectively established on May 21, 2007 on the official websites of Tianyancha and Qichacha. and January 4, 2007, and both have been cancelled. My father had worked in Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. for 15 years before the two labor dispatch companies were established.) I took my father’s latest salary card to the Bank of China to check. The account opening unit is Handan Iron and Steel Equipment Co., Ltd. Manufacturing and Installation Branch, the 2012 salary statement showed that the other party's account number: 101655402596 and 90295300185340084 were used to pay wages normally. It used to be an Industrial and Commercial Bank of China salary card. After activation, it was not used and was changed to a China Bank card. After that, all payments were made in cash. I reported to my father Zhang Huimin, the secretary of his section and the job introducer, sought confirmation that his father was not involved in labor dispatch, and that his salary had always been paid by Handan Iron and Steel! He reported this to the government hotline 12345, the governor’s mailbox, Sunshine Governance, Political Consultation Hebei, Human Resources and Social Security, State-owned Assets and other departments many times. , the complaint has been falsely handled, and the Handan Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau falsely handled the case to Sunshine Management (the Handan Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau retained Handan Iron and Steel’s forged labor dispatch agreement and refused to view it), the Handan Municipal Government hotline 12345 and the Hebei Provincial Government hotline 12345 forced False settlement, so far Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. and the organizer have never produced any legal evidence, and no department has thoroughly investigated Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.'s fraud.

【Sentence! 】Previously, the public security department discovered illegal deletions of posts on the Internet. After investigation and judgment, the suspects Wu and Zheng were arrested. After investigation, the two established two companies to engage in brand network optimization, technical services and information promotion. They transfer some complaints from consumers of financial and online lending companies on regular websites to their own website, and when the other party comes to visit them, they offer a paid post deletion service, charging fees ranging from RMB 60,000 to RMB 150,000. In one and a half years, the two companies made a total profit of more than 670,000 yuan. At present, the Suzhou Gusu District Court sentenced the two defendant companies to a fine of 100,000 yuan and 200,000 yuan respectively for the crime of illegal business operations, and sentenced the defendants Wu and Zheng to fixed-term imprisonment of 2 years and 9 months and 3 years and 1 month respectively. "Original title" Li Yong, the principal of Dezheng Middle School in Wei County, Hebei Province, received school selection fees from foreign students, and the Internet deleted the post like crazy. Does the director of the Education Bureau know? Li Yong, the principal of Dezheng Middle School in Wei County, Hebei Province, received school-choice fees from foreign students, and the Internet was frantically deleting the post. Does the Director of the Education Bureau know? During the enrollment period for primary school students to junior high schools in August 2023, Li Yong, the principal of Dezheng Middle School, illegally recruited high-priced students from outside the school. As long as you have money, power, and connections, no matter where you are, you can enter the school to study. Everyone Students need to pay school selection fees ranging from 5,000 yuan to 10,000 yuan. Principal Li Yong claimed: Our school strictly abides by the regulations of the education administration department and does not recruit outside students. May I ask Principal Li, Mr. Miao from Dazhuang Village, Shapuji Township? Is someone considered an outsider? How did I get into the seventh grade of Dezheng Middle School when I failed all the exams before entering school and scored more than ten points on one subject? So far, outside students from Dezheng Middle School are still entering the school one after another, but each student needs a school selection fee of several thousand to ten thousand yuan. Principal Li ignores the regulations of the Education Bureau and enrolls students in violation of regulations. As a school The principal does not pay attention to education, but recruits a large number of outside students to make a lot of money after taking office. I wonder if Principal Li’s background is strong or if the Education Bureau is lame? The Ninth Inspection Team of the Provincial Party Committee has launched an inspection in Wei County from October 16 to December 15, 2023. During this period, it is hoped that the relevant departments will strictly investigate illegal enrollment practices. It is also hoped that Comrade Li Yong, the principal of Dezheng Middle School, will recruit students from primary school to junior high school in 2023. The work should be made public to ensure educational fairness and equal rights in Wei County, so that educational fairness can be implemented in place, instead of letting Principal Li of Dezheng Middle School frantically delete posts. I had long been worried about having a facelift, but I also waited and watched for a long time, because I found that each doctor's speech seemed to make sense, but what they said was different. Some people also said that they were disfigured but they couldn't do anything and they were blamed. I think A little scary. I chose the director, a semi-retired person, to do the surgery out of trust. After all, he has been in the industry for 34 years, has performed more than 10,000 facelift surgeries with zero negative reviews, and has the title of chief physician of the Ministry of Health. This half reassured me. In addition, his shortcomings are quite safe. After entering the traffic era for several years, he still has high arrogance and looks down on traffic Internet celebrities. As a result, his reputation is lower now. He does not look like an Internet celebrity doctor with long hands. I think Relatively more reliable and safer. I have to say that the old doctor was stubborn and insisted that I be hospitalized for 5 days, but he gave me an irresistible reason: "In the first 5 days, either nothing happens, or hematoma disfigures me. If you step back ten thousand steps, you will still be there even if something happens." Under my nose, if something happens, I don't even have room to shirk. I'm not afraid of trouble. What are you afraid of?" I felt that this stubborn old man was very responsible, so I agreed to stay for 5 days. However, although I was hospitalized for a long time, I didn't worry at all during the period. I didn't feel any pain. I recovered very quickly and didn't need a headgear. On the third day after being discharged from the hospital, I saw no problem at all, with only a little swelling. It's been two or three years now, and still nothing has changed.
