The most uncomfortable thing about Episode 10 is the true reaction. No matter how men fight among themselves in the workplace, when facing women, they can use their male superiority and gender-specific hobbies to exclude women. Originally, they deliberately arranged the business meeting at the golf course without informing Wen Huixin. This is a very obvious gender-based exclusion and isolation in the workplace. In addition to the large number of people and the gathering of male hobbies and desires, another method used is sexual harassment in the workplace, including but not limited to the pun-intended "third hole" mentioned in this episode. In this episode, men in the workplace use their gender to exclude women. I have basically experienced similar things. For example, they smoked heavily in front of me during meetings, they went to the corridor to smoke together when they needed to have private conversations, and after a business dinner, we walked together to a place where sex and violence were done. , give me a subtle and obvious gender exclusion of "you are different from us", "you can't share dirty secrets like brothers", "how can you and us be honest with each other like brothers" . My boss once told his secretary that I should have been promoted long ago, but unfortunately I was not at the headquarters. What was even more unfortunate was that I was a woman and could only get second-tier opportunities. So after watching this episode, those memories of dying while working started to attack me again. But fortunately, I am now a lawyer. Although I still bear the issue of gender disadvantage, I can make my own decisions in most situations. Why are men naturally united in the workplace and actively and tacitly exploit women? It is not the work itself that creates oppression, but the social relations that sustain this system of exploitation. I think the core is that patriarchy is at the core of capitalism. So the problem is superficially a problem of social role stereotypes and their socialization, but the root cause is patriarchy. These institutions and facilities define women as part of nature and must be controlled and dominated by men. As Beauvoir said, "In ancient times, an absolute vertical line was used as a reference to illustrate other oblique lines, but now the male is established as an absolute human standard. Being a man is always right, because he Being a man; being a woman is always wrong.” Under the patriarchal system based on men, women have never formed an independent closed society. They are combined with the male dominant group and occupy a subordinate position in the group. status; they are merely of the same kind, bound together by a mechanical agreement: there is no organic agreement between them on which a unified community is built..." Therefore, they hold a common belief that the patriarchal social order is the The only feasible basis is that the male-dominated political system around the world has become their common serious political commitment. Therefore, based on the common belief of patriarchy, men are particularly united based on gender discrimination. Among them, gender segregation and exclusion of women are male employees. A way to gain internal unity. So why are women so easily divided? Because the patriarchal system unites men with each other, but separates women from each other. Women are either their mother's daughters or mothers of daughters, and they do not have an identity of their own. Or, because they do not have the resources, they have to compete with each other for men to gain the power behind them. Therefore, the improvement of "News Queen" and "The Evil of the Golden Branch" is that they both choose powerful men. Some old, smooth and unattractive images, thus portraying the weakness and emptiness of power itself. What women compete for is never men, but power itself, which has nothing to do with sex. Close d

I spent one day over the weekend and watched the 15 episodes of "The Beginning". I feel that an episode of about 45 minutes (second from left, third from right) including the opening and ending songs is the best arrangement for the length of a single episode of the series. Everything is in the right rhythm, very Comfortable. I wonder if there is any scientific reason for this, just like a school class is also 45 minutes long (if I remember correctly). Some dramas are good to watch, but if they are 50+ or even one hour or 79 minutes per episode, even if the number of episodes is less than 15, it feels like it will take at least two days to watch, and it cannot be watched in one day. Compared with the continuous loop of reasoning and thrilling tense scenes, what goes deeper into my heart is the family story behind the people on the bus. They are not refined, noble or elegant, they are plain and simple but have the purest passion. The unemployed migrant worker who lives in a garage, sanitary napkins are a luxury item to his daughter, but he is willing to give one to the heroine who "urgently needs it". And it was so difficult for him that when he was hesitant to help capture the murderer, he decided to help when he confirmed that he might be able to do something for the reward. His story will remain etched in my heart for a long time. I always feel that they are me, and I am them, with no fixed place to live, no one to rely on, working the lowest level of hard work, earning a meager salary and fearing that my job may not be available tomorrow, and having to spend a lot of time looking for one. No matter how hard you work to earn a living, you don’t dare to take a break even if you work hard and work hard. I remember when I was a child and a few months ago I saw motorcycle passengers squatting on the roadside squatting to eat and make a living by carrying passengers. When I saw them, I felt that my body would be overwhelmed by the endless sorrow and the heaviness of powerlessness. Perhaps it is also because of my concern for these relevant social issues that I feel very uncomfortable with the ending, which seems to avoid the important points and rush to the happy reunion. I feel that the whole drama is just picking up the drama and putting it down gently. . It is difficult for people at the bottom to make a living, and they are willing to risk their lives for bonuses. They live in a dignified environment and cannot afford sanitary napkins. They are molested on public transportation and have no way to complain. They dare not speak out for fear of retaliation. Sexual harassment offenders receive light sentences. The victim is guilty (for wearing a short skirt). is a sin), the voice of justice for online violence. All justice can only attract attention through the "injustice" of the victim to retaliate, and can be realized in the time reversal that is impossible to happen in reality. Each one is a very heavy and profound social issue, but in the end it ends lightly, as if it was just blown by the wind. Maybe there are reasons for the script creator’s skill, reasons for censorship, or reasons that cannot be explained. I wish there were more and more in-depth works exploring these issues, but the fact that they are mentioned is a grudging consolation. But I remembered another sentence, late justice is not justice (it is just comfort). Just sigh. Hide d

Wang Sleeping, the Love of the Superior When this season of "Goodbye My Lover" was first aired, everyone had very good comments about Wang Sleeping: sober, rational, sharp, and with three correct views. At the wedding, her bridesmaid was sexually harassed by Zhang Shuo's friend. Zhang Shuo apologized to her friend, but did not let the person who committed the sexual harassment apologize. For this reason, Wang Sleeping has never been able to get over this hurdle, because she feels that if a person does not even have a basic sense of justice and morality, then she should consider marrying this person. So it's been three years since the wedding took place, but she hasn't received the certificate yet. At that time, everyone thought that it was because of this incident that Sleepy was having a hard time with it, which affected her relationship with Zhang Shuo. After looking at it, I found that it was not entirely like this. Today I saw Question 36. It has been 18 days. Wang Sleepy and Zhang Shuo acted as if nothing had happened. The way and content of their quarrel was just like the first day of recording the show. The two of them seemed to be going around in circles, with nothing changing. What exactly is sexual harassment? My colleagues have asked me this question, fans have asked me, and male classmates who want to keep themselves clean have also asked me. In my opinion, the answer is actually very simple. If the other person's actions, words, or even the look in his eyes make you feel sexual discomfort, it is sexual harassment. The judgment of sexual harassment is based only on the subjective feelings of the victim, not the subjective wishes of the offender. So if we feel harassed in our daily life, we don’t need to think about whether the perpetrator has no malicious intent or whether he was careless. Instead, we should respect our own feelings and point out the inappropriateness of these behaviors. We want to use this video to further clarify what sexual harassment is, and what victims, bystanders, and perpetrators can do when facing sexual harassment. We hope that one day, these contents can become common knowledge that no longer needs to be popularized. I also highly recommend everyone to watch the short film "By Your Side" shot by L'Oréal Paris x Shanyi, co-directed by Han Xia and actor Xin Zhilei. The short film once again answers the questions of what sexual harassment is and what we should do about it. "Beside You" depicts two scenes of sexual harassment in the workplace and sexual harassment from strangers. As a colleague and friend of the victim, Xin Zhilei was by her side, believed in her, and gave her the strength to speak out and resist. L'Oréal Paris has also released "She Guards 36 Strategies", which can help us identify invisible harassment behaviors in life, and also give us how to deal with some specific situations as bystanders. We will post the link in the comment area. We hope that You can learn about it, but you will never use it. LAlex is definitely a girl’s Weibo video. Hide d

Too bloody! In Hanzhong, Shaanxi Province, a couple was toasting to the guests at a wedding. Suddenly, the father-in-law, who had drunk too much, picked up the daughter-in-law next to him. After putting her daughter-in-law down, she still hugged her waist. The mother-in-law next to her suddenly turned green. Got it! Netizen: Never let father-in-law and daughter-in-law be alone! Guo Xiaosong's hometown is a quiet and ancient town, surrounded by green mountains and gurgling rivers. The people here are old-fashioned and traditional, and marriage is still an extremely important matter for many families. Guo Xiaosong, an ordinary and slightly dull young man, at the age of 28, under the supervision of his family, began a blind date journey for a long-awaited lifelong event. Xiaosong's mother ran around for his marriage, looking for a suitable girl for him again and again. However, Xiaosong's dullness and poor words prevented him from impressing several girls after meeting them. Until one day, he met Zhang Yuting. Yuting's beautiful appearance and slender figure made Xiaosong excited. When they met for the first time, Yuting's generosity and initiative made him feel an unprecedented sense of comfort. The two had a pleasant exchange and left each other's contact information. Not long after, Yuting came to Xiaosong's house as a guest and explored Xiaosong's life and family. Although Xiaosong's family background is solid, his introversion and ordinary appearance make Yuting more interested in him. The luxurious decoration of Xiaomatsu's home also makes her look forward to the future. As a result, the relationship between the two quickly heated up and they reached the point of discussing marriage. The day of the engagement party finally arrived. On this day, the home was decorated with joy and lanterns were hung high. Xiaosong's father, Lao Guo, is a middle-aged man who looks ordinary but has a delicate mind. He is particularly concerned about his son's marriage. At the banquet, Lao Guo's concern for his daughter-in-law was beyond ordinary. A pair of eyes stared directly at the daughter-in-law, seeming to have an unspeakable meaning. As the banquet progressed, Lao Guo gradually became a little tipsy. He stood in front of every table, his tipsy smile revealing happiness and satisfaction. Friends congratulated him on getting a virtuous and beautiful daughter-in-law. When Lao Guo heard the compliment, he was immediately elated. However, what happened next made the entire banquet instantly quiet. After congratulating her, an old friend suddenly said to Lao Guo: "Congratulations, Lao Guo, you have a virtuous and beautiful daughter-in-law!" Lao Guo couldn't help but smile triumphantly when he heard his friend's compliment. Then, he walked to his daughter-in-law Yuting without hesitation. Yu Ting stood aside, wearing a gorgeous cheongsam showing her graceful figure. Lao Guo's smile became even brighter, and he suddenly hugged Yu Ting. Yu Ting did not signal resistance, but swayed her cheongsam sensibly. This sudden scene stunned everyone present. Lao Guo hugged his daughter-in-law and said to everyone with a smile: "We... have a custom... that is, the father-in-law wants to carry his daughter-in-law into the house... I will give it a try today..." For a moment, everyone was surprised and embarrassed. , the scene was silent. The sudden action shocked everyone, and the scene was extremely embarrassing. A blush appeared on Yuting's face, but out of respect for her elders, she did not show displeasure and just lowered her head shyly. The mother-in-law next to her was even more flushed, with dissatisfaction and embarrassment flashing in her eyes. But it was difficult for her to have an attack in front of so many guests. Lao Guo seemed to be completely unaware, his smile was still bright, and he never put down the wine glass in his hand. He held Yu Ting high and maintained an intimate posture. Everyone's eyes turned to the bride and groom, and the atmosphere of the wedding was instantly broken by this unexpected scene. However, Lao Guo did not stop because of this, and still held his daughter-in-law's waist. It was not until others reminded him that Lao Guo put down his hand, but looked at Yu Ting with happiness on his face. The whole scene fell into an eerie silence, followed by applause. People applauded, perhaps surprised by this sudden move, or cheering for the happiness of the newlyweds. The wedding continued, but Lao Guo's performance became the focus of the day and was talked about by people. A guest at the scene recorded a video of this scene and posted it online, which immediately aroused heated discussion. Some netizens said, It doesn’t matter if there is no such father-in-law. Is this making other people laugh? Where is my son? Where is your mother-in-law? No matter what the reason is, I will never agree to hug you! Some netizens said that the father-in-law was trying to be a gangster by drinking, so why didn't so many women hug him and try to get one step ahead of him? Some netizens expressed their understanding and thought that this was no problem. It was a happy wedding and just a joke, and my father-in-law would not be like this normally. First of all, from an emotional and moral perspective, Lao Guo's behavior was obviously inappropriate. Although in Chinese culture, there are no strict boundaries between father-in-law and daughter-in-law. But on this occasion, Lao Guo's behavior obviously violated the generally accepted moral norms of society, that is, appropriate distance and respect should be maintained between father-in-law and daughter-in-law. Secondly, from a legal perspective, although Lao Guo's behavior may not constitute a crime. However, his behavior may be considered obscene or sexual harassment. In addition, from a legal perspective, Lao Guo's behavior while drunk may involve issues of legal liability. If Lao Guo loses his normal ability to judge and control due to drunkenness, his legal liability may be reduced. However, this needs to be based on specific legal provisions and court judgment. Specifically, the "Women's Rights and Interests Protection Law" stipulates: "It is prohibited to sexually harass women against their will through words, texts, images, physical behaviors, etc." If Lao Guo's behavior is determined to be sexual harassment, he may face Administrative penalties or civil compensation. According to Article 3 of the Supreme Court's "Interpretation on Several Issues Concerning the Application of Law in the Trial of Cases of Crimes of Obstructing Marriage and Family", it is also clearly stipulated that acts that infringe on the physical dignity of others that occur at other people's weddings may constitute crimes of impeding marriage and family. In short, the customary behavior of "carrying the daughter-in-law into the house" is very inappropriate and disrespectful of the bride's dignity. What do you think about this? This has nothing to do with gender, but a matter of ability, values and aesthetics. In 1991, Sakamoto Yuji was able to write a character like Rika who dares to love and hate, and who challenges secular love relationships. The 10-year-old "Mother" focused on the issues of domestic violence and single mothers, and the 2012-year-old "Problem Restaurant" even discussed the workplace. Regarding the issue of sexual harassment, our country also had "Don't Talk to Strangers" as early as 2001, and in 2003 there were anti-domestic violence and sexual harassment TV series such as "Women Are No Longer Silent." It was written in last year's hit "Restart Life" The screenwriter of this excellent female group drama "Restart Life" is also a male screenwriter. Looking at the female characters in films such as "Green Snake" and "Butterfly Lovers" produced by Chinese director Tsui Hark more than 20 years ago, the female characters have already relied on gender stereotypes. The female characters in my favorite domestic drama "The Way of Heaven" are also mine. The goal of learning and striving. I think that the portrayal of female characters in this drama is the ceiling of domestic dramas and even Asian film and television dramas of the same period. I strongly recommend that current screenwriters and directors learn how to portray female characters. If you want to write about an idealist with faith, look at Rui Xiaodan. If you want to write about a resolute entrepreneur, look at Ouyang Xue. If you want to write about an independent and sober urban beauty, look at Xiao Yawen. Lecture｜The first critical period and the second sensitive period of brain development: What can we do? The human brain has about 100 billion neurons, and the synaptic density of children is much higher than that of adults. The peak period of synaptic growth in children is also the period of fastest intellectual development. Sports, games, playing, fiddling, and graffiti are the main things children learn. form. What kind of care can make infants and young children feel full of security and deep love? What kind of companionship can help children learn to trust, stabilize their hearts, and steadily develop their life potential in a healthy attachment relationship? When children enter their sensitive period, what kind of support can help them maintain their innocent curiosity about the outside world and dare to launch dynamic explorations? On November 25, we invited teacher Chen Ye, a child psychologist, to give a special lecture to parents, friends and teachers to answer one by one the troubles that trouble you when children and teenagers grow up. Speaker: Chen Ye, Palo Alto University, USA* Master of Psychological Counseling and Therapy (*Professional School of Psychology that trains clinical psychologists in the United States) University of California, Berkeley*Bachelor of Psychology Counseling (*Ranked 2nd in psychology in the United States) American Psychological Counseling Teacher Chen Ye, a member of the Association of Psychological Counselors (ACA) and a member of the Shanghai International Psychological Counselors Association, a second-level psychological counselor in China, pays special attention to children’s: • Emotions (anxiety, loss of control, etc.) • Behavior (aggression) • Interpersonal interactions (school, family, society) (Relationship issues) • Trauma (bullying, sexual harassment, neglect, divorce, death of loved ones, etc.) For children, she will mainly provide psychological assessment and intervention for children through the PlayTherapy (play therapy) model. For parents, through family interviews (for foreign families, English language is available) and training, we help everyone understand their children, promote their children's mental health, and improve parent-child relationships. Cultivating a Better Brain Series 2 Adolescence: The second sensitive period of brain development - the moment of "crisis" and "opportunity", what can we do? If the child has passed the early childhood period when the brain develops rapidly, when is the other critical period for brain development? The general consensus in neuroscience and psychology is – adolescence. Adolescence is a challenging, confusing time. In addition to physical changes and hormonal changes, adolescent brains are also going through a very critical "remodeling" period. Understanding the science behind adolescent brain development will help parents better prepare for this important period in their children's growth and development. Lecture sharing: *Characteristics of brain development in adolescence: prefrontal cortex, limbic system, dopamine, etc. *How to understand the "crisis" and "opportunity" moments of brain development? *How to understand teenagers' emotions, behaviors, thoughts, and needs? *How to get along with them? Suitable for: *Parents of teenagers aged 10-18 years old; *Parents of children aged 0-10 years old (*If you want to prepare your children for puberty early, you are especially welcome); *You are interested in the psychological development of teenagers and corresponding family upbringing. Lecture time: November 25, 2023 (Saturday) 19:00-20:30* Please arrive on time* Lecture duration is 1.5-2 hours* In order for you and others to listen more safely, please do not bring children to this lecture. Thank you for your cooperation! Charge: 99 yuan/person/session (discounted price of 49 yuan for annual card readers) Limit: 40 persons Location: No. 1000, Luocheng Road, Xuhui District * If you drive by car, you can navigate to the "Meitong Science and Technology Innovation Space Ground Parking Lot" * Metro No. 1 3 Line 15 Shanghai South Railway Station Station Line 15 East China University of Science and Technology StationCollapse d

After Motie Books and "New Weekly" terminated their cooperative relationship with Shi Hang, the One-way Street Library issued a statement on Weibo on May 4: "We have noticed the news about Shi Hang's sexual harassment incident. More than two dozen people broke the news. There are victims among us. We once again declare that One Direction will not cooperate with Shi Hang in any form." On the same day, Gulou West Theater also issued a statement: "We remain highly concerned about Shi Hang's alleged sexual harassment accusations. After learning of As soon as the accusations and reports were made, we stopped all cooperation with Shi Hang. Gulou West Theater firmly supports and safeguards women's rights and has zero tolerance for all forms of offense and infringement." According to Qizhacha, Shi Hang He is one of the shareholders of Beijing Gulou West Culture Co., Ltd., with a shareholding ratio of 5.0332%. In addition, QY, who once accused Shi Hang of verbally and physically sexually harassing her in the workplace, told The Paper that she is starting to notarize the evidence. In response to this incident, The Paper reporter interviewed Feng Yuan, a researcher in the field of gender equality. In the discussion about this incident, many people interpreted the chat history between Shi Hang and the victim as "flirting" and believed that this was not sexual harassment. In this regard, Feng Yuan pointed out that the key to whether an act constitutes sexual harassment lies in the recipient of the act. If the recipient feels it is unwelcome, it is sexual harassment. And third parties are not qualified to judge. "Sometimes the same sentence is very offensive or harassing to some people, but to others it may be what they expect, so the third party's standards cannot be used to measure the feelings of the parties involved." Feng Yuan explain. She also added that even if Shi Hang's ex-girlfriend is among the victims, harassment or assault may still occur in an intimate relationship. Feng Yuan also mentioned that my country's anti-sexual harassment law has not been well publicized, and society lacks education in this area and lacks a basis for establishing a consensus on this issue. That’s why many people don’t understand the definition of sexual harassment and have objections. OWeb linkCollapsed

[Japan’s Cabinet Office staff secretly filmed female high school students in elevators and said they were “too stressed” after being caught] 7 According to a report from China News Network citing the Japan Broadcasting Corporation (NHK), on the morning of the 20th local time, a staff member of the Japanese Cabinet Office The police at Ofuna Station in Kamakura City, Kanagawa Prefecture, were arrested on suspicion of secretly photographing a female high school student. The police subsequently found multiple secretly photographed photos on her mobile phone and are currently investigating further. According to reports, the man involved is now 31 years old and is a staff member of the Cabinet Office of the Japanese Central Government. On that day, he tried to secretly photograph a female high school student in the elevator of the station. Station staff noticed that she was behaving abnormally, and immediately controlled her and handed her over to the police. When questioned by the police, the man confessed to the secret filming and said that the reason for the secret filming was "because of excessive work pressure." The police later found a number of candid photos on the man's mobile phone and decided to conduct further investigation into the man. The Japanese Cabinet Office responded that it was "currently under investigation and will not provide detailed explanations for the time being." This is not the first time that Japanese Cabinet Office personnel have been exposed to similar scandals. In September, Fumio Kishida had just significantly reorganized the cabinet and adjusted senior personnel of the Liberal Democratic Party. But just over a month later, cabinet members had troubles one after another. On October 26, Japan’s Liberal Democratic Party Senator Taro Yamada, the Administrative Officer of Japan’s Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, was forced to resign from his post as Administrative Officer after an extramarital affair scandal was exposed. Fumio Kishida admitted in Congress that there was “appointment responsibility.” On October 31, Japan’s Deputy Minister of Justice Kakizawa Mitaru resigned due to alleged violations of the Public Office Election Law. Kakizawa is a member of parliament elected from Tokyo's Koto Ward. Previously, Koto Ward Mayor Kimura Yayoi and her team were raided by the Tokyo Prefectural Prosecutor's Special Investigation Department on suspicion of violating public office election laws. Kakizawa admitted that he made suggestions to Kimura regarding illegal campaigning. On November 13, Japanese Deputy Finance Minister Kenji Kanda was forced to resign due to the tax arrears scandal. Kanda is a tax accountant, but not only does his company owe taxes, he also violates industry regulations and fails to participate in necessary training. After the incident came to light, Kanda refused to resign for a time, but due to pressure, he had no choice but to resign on the 13th. Fumio Kishida apologized again in Congress for this. On November 17, Defense Ministry Administrative Officer Shingo Miyake was exposed by the media for sexually harassing a female subordinate. Defense Minister Minoru Kihara asked Miyake to explain the situation. According to the poll results released by Japan's "Mainichi Shimbun" on the 19th, the approval rate of the cabinet led by Japanese Prime Minister Kishida Fumio dropped to 21%, setting a new low since Kishida became prime minister in October 2021. Japanese media analyzed that the main reasons for the continued decline in Kishida's cabinet support rate were people's lack of support for the cabinet's new economic policies and the resignation of several cabinet members due to scandals. In this regard, 56% of the respondents believed that Kishida "bears a great responsibility", and 55% of the respondents expressed the hope that Kishida would resign as soon as possible. (Jimu News)Collapse d

It’s scary to think about this carefully. The moment the screenwriter shouted “I am a mountain!”, this powerful text was deconstructed twice on the Internet platform. "I was born to be a mountain, not a stream. I want to be on the top of the mountains and look down on the mediocre ravines. I was born to be a hero, not a mediocre person. I stand on the shoulders of great men and look down on humble cowards!" This is a passionate text, it is sonorous and powerful. , inspiring and full of energy. When Zhang Guimei's students recite in unison, the scene can make people cry. However, when the screenwriter went crazy on the Internet and shouted, "I am a mountain!", the original power of this paragraph was weakened. It was injected with a trace of madness, a half-wisp of comedy, and Erliang's limited talent but unwilling to admit it. big. Language cannot withstand deconstruction. The chrysanthemums of twenty years ago were still chrysanthemums, and the Xiangs of twenty years ago were Xiangs. Miss, used to be an honorific title, and comrade was supposed to mean like-minded. Before the sexual harassment story started trending, we heard Chorus was thinking about ice cream. This is deconstruction. In the evolution of different events, language is given multiple meanings, becomes more complex and muddy, and even changes its original definition. In this kind of deconstruction, the light will dim, the courage will weaken, the ambition and ideals will even disappear, and what is left in the end is one "meme" after another. In this world, some people and things cannot avoid being deconstructed, while some people and things really should not be deconstructed. Mediocre literary and artistic creators, stay away from famous works and celebrities, and maintain a heart of awe. This is your greatest contribution to the world, please! Hide d

"The Bird in the Cage" is serialized @十年阳里i Mixed Gentle Attack ✘ Beauty is depressed and suffers 2. Mingzhou has insomnia. He lay on the bed, his fingers resting on the pull tab of the drawer. The empty wooden cabinet made Mingzhou collapse. All the sleeping pills hidden in the bedside table were taken away by the maid. The doctor repeatedly warned Mingzhou not to be so dependent on medicine. It was very difficult to hide medicine. Everyone knows that Mingzhou cannot be allowed to commit suicide. The young master is unwilling and unable to be admitted to a mental hospital and chooses to hide here, so he must take all measures to prevent the other party from committing suicide. Mingzhou Bai had hidden the medicine for so long. Just thinking about racking his brains and being careful some time ago was in vain. He was powerless. The air conditioner is turned on for heating, and the outdoor unit is a bit loud due to aging. The butterfly slept with its belly spread out in the nest. Mingzhou's upper body was naked, his hair was like algae, half of it was spread on his back and half of it was spread on the bed. Why is it so uncomfortable? why me? Why will I never get better? I don't want to live anymore. Mingzhou cried, his eyelids turning red. ...When morning came, Mingzhou was still weak. He was covered in cold sweat. The bed was like a bottomless sponge. Mingzhou was stuck in it and couldn't get out. Butterfly wanted to go to the toilet, so she screamed, licked Mingzhou's face, and asked someone to get up and open the door. "Butterfly..." He felt like vomiting as he spoke. Looking at the big dog's anxious expression, he struggled to sit up and open the door. The waitress was already waiting at the door. The expression on her face was very serious, she pursed her lips, frowned slightly, and glanced at Mingzhou. Logically speaking, if a waitress treats Mingzhou like this, she should leave. But now she is very popular with Ming Chongli, and she is simply arrogant in doing things. The butterfly rubbed Mingzhou's calf and fled out, its claws hitting the ground with a "kick-kick-kick" sound. "Prepare breakfast for me." He spoke weakly, with no blood on his face, and the dark circles under his eyes made him look particularly tired. Even so, Mingzhou is eye-catchingly beautiful. The most beautiful house bird of the Ming Dynasty. The person Ming Chongli said didn't come until evening. Also following the guests was Mingcheng. Mingzhou's brother. Mingzhou, the two men who came down, didn't want to pay attention to them. He looked at the little girl getting off the passenger seat and finally felt a little happier. "Button," he waved to the little girl, motioning for her to come over, "Are you here to accompany me?" Button is the son of the Ming family and has been with Mingzhou since he was a child. In fact, she is four years older than Mingzhou, but she has a baby face and looks smaller. Her pupils are large and black, and her facial features are delicate and beautiful, just like the ceramic dolls displayed in the window. "Yeah," Button smiled at Mingzhou, "The master said I can come over to accompany you. Xiuxiu will also come in a few days. Now all the servants here will be transferred to the old house, leaving only the two of us. Take care of you." Mingzhou cried again, feeling aggrieved and happy at the same time. It's not that Mingzhou likes to cry. He is sick, mentally sensitive and fragile, and always on the verge of emotional collapse. In addition, he is born with incontinence of tears, and his eyes can't wait to cry until he is blind. Mingcheng was accustomed to Mingzhou crying, so he casually looked at the shabby yard with no interest, and took a few casual glances at his cell phone before locking the phone and talking to Mingzhou again. "Mingzhou, are you stupid for crying here?" Mingcheng always speaks with a condescending tone. Many people feel uncomfortable hearing such a tone, but Mingzhou is used to it. His attitude towards Mingcheng Just like Mingcheng's attitude towards him, the two of them looked at each other with disgust. Mingzhou ignored this sentence and just let the button spin around in front of him, and then asked himself questions. The guests were quiet and did not engage in any conversation. He is very tall and has three-dimensional facial features, unlike those of Asians. This person is indeed not Asian, at least not entirely. His eyes are gray. Mingcheng was not annoyed by Mingzhou's attitude towards him. He turned around and said a few words to the guest before leading them in. Mingzhou looked back at the two people who had passed him. He was not unhappy, but felt numb in his heart. Butterfly was still in the yard, and the beautiful big dog barked twice when he saw the stranger. He looked at Mingcheng and felt that he looked familiar. He came closer and smelled it, and then started barking again. Mingcheng, a person that no dog likes. "Butterfly, you are so snobbish. I fed you when you were a child, and it wasn't you who grabbed my legs for food? Now you actually scream at me, you are not a good girl anymore." Mingcheng raised his eyebrows and held his hand. On the waist, "Sit down, stop barking." Butterfly listened to the instructions, swayed its butt without a tail twice, then sat on the ground, looking up at Mingcheng. "Butterfly, go back." Mingzhou was only wearing a light gray sweater. He glanced at Mingcheng and didn't like the instructions he gave to his dog. Butterfly listened to Mingzhou's words even more. It looked at Mingzhou for a few times and then entered the house obediently. Mingzhou didn't want to go against Ming Chongli, but he still chose to turn a blind eye to his guests for the time being. But after seeing a few more people, Mingzhou already lost his strength. He did whatever Mingcheng wanted to do, waved his hand and entered the room. From the beginning to the end, Mingzhou never looked at the guest once and completely ignored Ming Chongli's instructions. ...The waitress didn't know that Mingcheng was here. She had forgotten her habits after staying here in Mingzhou. When she came down from the second floor and saw Mingcheng, her heart skipped a beat. "You are too unruly." Mingcheng smiled, holding an empty cup in his hand. Button heated up the hot tea, poured the tea skillfully and placed it on the table in front of the two of them. "My dad gave you a good look, but why do you have the guts to do this?" Mingcheng raised his eyelids and continued talking without any smile in his eyes. "Young Master...I, I, I'm getting ready to greet you..." The waitress spoke softly, not as unruly as she was in front of Mingzhou. "The Ming family doesn't hate Mingzhou, do you understand? Why don't you think about it?" Mingcheng turned his head to look at the buttons, took the person's hand, and pinched the other person's wrist. Button furrowed his eyebrows as he watched Mingcheng sexually harassing him. He used his skill to break free and left without looking back. "Tsk," Mingcheng was not happy that the button left like this, and finally casually said to the waitress, "You and I will go back to the old house in a while." Ming Chongli's man Ming Chongli cleaned up by himself, and he didn't have time to waste on this kind of thing. On unimportant people. Ming Chongli valued Mingzhou's value. If he knew that his precious little son was treated like this by a maid who was not even his mistress, some maids would be in trouble. "Mingzhou doesn't seem to welcome me." Husband Wanyuan looked around the room with interest. He was only wearing a shirt on such a cold day. After entering the air-conditioned house, he still felt a little hot. He untied it with one hand. Two buttons. "He doesn't welcome anyone," Mingcheng shrugged, "especially you and me." There were daffodils in the living room, and the leaves were hanging weakly because of the air conditioning. "He doesn't like men?" Fu Wanyuan suddenly asked with a serious expression. Mingcheng was in a daze and couldn't understand her husband Wan Yuan's brain circuit. "Him? How do I know if he likes men? He can only like people arranged by Ming Chongli." He can only like people arranged by Ming Chongli. What a statement. Husband Wanyuan's mother is Russian. He has lived in Europe since he was a child, and occasionally spends a year in China. His way of thinking is "straightforward" that is common among Europeans and Americans, and few people talk to him in a roundabout way. Not really understanding Mingcheng's answer to him, he could only temporarily attribute the reason to the fact that Ming Jia's elders may have different ideas than ordinary people. The guest room was neatly tidied up with the click of a button. Along with them were other servants of the Ming family. These people were all the people Mingcheng was accustomed to, so she placed things and dealt with things very quickly. It was almost half past eight when the meal was ready. Button went to knock on Mingzhou's door. After knocking for a long time, no one came to open it, so he took the spare key and opened the door. As soon as I entered, I saw Butterfly holding his rice bowl in his mouth and trying to run out. Button shushed quietly to quiet the butterfly. She walked over and knelt down on the carpet next to Mingzhou's bed, "Master."

【】The "China Statistical Yearbook 2023" compiled and published by the National Bureau of Statistics published the birth rate, death rate and natural growth rate data of 31 provinces. A reporter from China Business News found that in 2022, the birth rate of 9 provinces will exceed 8 per thousand (8‰); in 20 provinces, the natural population growth rate (natural increase in population (number of births - number of deaths)/average total population in the same period) population) was negative, an increase of 7 from the previous year. Generally speaking, the current measures to encourage childbirth in various places include the payment of maternity subsidies, house purchase subsidies and other measures, and the target targets are mainly families with two or three children. But encouraging childbearing cannot just focus on the second and third children. Dong Yuzheng, a population expert and special researcher at the Counselor's Office of the Guangdong Provincial Government, believes that there are now more measures to encourage the birth of three children in various places, and some are also encouraging the birth of two children, while relatively speaking, there are fewer one-child births. However, the number of three-child births is inherently small. To significantly improve the actual effect of the active family planning policy, the focus of childbirth subsidies must be moved forward and the fundamentals of one-child births must be consolidated. "Encouraging childbearing should start with one child." The birth rate of O31 provinces: 9 provinces exceed 8‰, and the natural population growth rate of 20 provinces is negative.

I finished it (the second domestic drama I followed this year), and I really enjoyed it. Although the part about the sexual harassment case was lengthy, it was very meaningful (it was a bit long and the plot was a bit draggy). The idea was very good, and it clearly pointed out similar cases of sexual harassment in the workplace. The difficulty of situations such as domestic violence and domestic violence has been mentioned and analyzed in depth, which is its value and significance); the characters are very vivid, everyone has their own characteristics and personality, and the actors are very Different characters are portrayed, and they are real characters (rather than flat images). Some people love them to the point of love, and some people hate them to the bone. However, there are some shortcomings, and they are somewhat unrealistic, but after all, film and television works come from life but can be more exaggerated (and in many cases in real life, they may be more "exciting" than TV series). Regarding Luo Yingzi's slap at the airport, it was a heart-wrenching slap. What's even better is that all the emotions in the previous few minutes were foreshadowed. It was the grievances, tolerance, love and hate of the entire drama that finally broke out in this slap. But I still have to say that even if she is a saint, even if Luo Yingzi's father taught her from a young age that she should repay evil with kindness, be considerate of the difficulties of others, and feel the suffering and pity of the world, after everything she has experienced, he will not consider explaining the past.
